name: CC+ Cream Illumination with SPF 50+
about: What it is:A color-correcting, full-coverage foundation with SPF 50 physical mineral sunscreen that delivers a flawless, radiant finish..Coverage:Full.Finish:Radiant.Formulation:Cream.SPF:SPF 50+.Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:Free of sulfates SLS & SLES, parabens, and phthalates..What Else You Need to Know:Developed with plastic surgeons and dermatologists, this full-coverage CC cream is infused with SPF 50 mineral sunscreen and drops of light technology for radiance. Formulated to improve the appearance of lines and wrinkles, this foundation gives a luminous, supple look to skin.
ingredients: ACTIVE INGREDIENTS..TITANIUM DIOXIDE 9%..ZINC OXIDE 6.3%....INGREDIENTS:..WATER, PHENYL TRIMETHICONE, DIMETHICONE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, BUTYLENE GLYCOL DICAPRYLATE/DICAPRATE, ORBIGNYA OLEIFERA SEED OIL, BUTYLOCTYL SALICYLATE, CETYL PEG/PPG-10/1 DIMETHICONE, CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, SNAIL SECRETION FILTRATE, ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE, MAGNESIUM SULFATE, POLYGLYCERYL-4 ISOSTEARATE, STEARIC ACID, CYCLOHEXASILOXANE, DIMETHICONE/VINYL DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, HEXYL LAURATE, CALCIUM STEARATE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE, ETHYL HEXANEDIOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, LIMONENE, CITRUS LIMON (LEMON) PEEL OIL, SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, CITRUS AURANTIUM BERGAMIA (BERGAMOT) FRUIT OIL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, ADENOSINE, CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) PEEL OIL, CITRUS AURANTIFOLIA (LIME) OIL, PINUS SYLVESTRIS LEAF OIL, LINALOOL, EUCALYPTUS GLOBULUS LEAF OIL, GLYCERIN, CITRAL, HYDROLYZED COLLAGEN, STEARETH-20, CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) LEAF EXTRACT, PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE, CHLORHEXIDINE DIGLUCONATE, N-HYDROXYSUCCINIMIDE, NIACINAMIDE, HYALURONIC ACID, COLLOIDAL OATMEAL, SODIUM CITRATE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, PALMITOYL TRIPEPTIDE-1, CHRYSIN, PALMITOYL TETRAPEPTIDE-7, CITRIC ACID, BIOTIN, SILK EXTRACT, HYDROLYZED SILK, [MAY CONTAIN] MICA, IRON OXIDES, TITANIUM DIOXIDE V283863/1
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Perfect for dry skin, apply one to two pumps of this tinted moisturizer to clean skin using the Heavenly Skin™ CC+™ Skin Perfecting Brush #702 (sold separately)..-Can be used as a full-coverage foundation, SPF 50 physical sunscreen, brightening color corrector, hydrating serum, pore-less finish primer, dark spot concealer, or moisturizing day cream..-Pair with Your Skin But Better Makeup Primer (sold separately) and CC+ Airbrush Perfecting Powder (sold separately) for a long-lasting, full-coverage makeup look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have been repurchasing for years! I wear it literally every day, can build up if you want more coverage but honestly, just get it. It’s amazing.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not a major fan because it’s supposed to be full coverage but I would call it medium. It’s not a buildable coverage so my red acne zits definitely show through, in comparison to Estée Lauder’s Futurist Hydra Rescue which is buildable and covers much better.   The shimmer is kinda nice but if you are going outside, it’s too obvious of a sparkle to wear out in public. So I only wear for evenings / indoor outings.   Also, when I just throw it on in the morning for a casual day and don’t use setting spray, it seems to rub off very easily.   Won’t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_title: Very Sparkly In The Sun - Prefer Original
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Original (holy grail) for years. The Illumination CC cream is beautiful and gives you a really pretty healthy glow…but I’m outside in the sun daily and personally think it’s way too sparkly in direct sunlight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the holy grail! I have received so many compliments since I started using this. It gives my skin a fantastic glowy finish & feels incredible on the skin. And I have never had a product match my skin so perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looking for a color so I can reorder. Can someone help me find this color?  Current tube says:  (L) MYWD3W

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to foundation. I have tried so many and keep going back to this one. I love that it illuminates and has SPF. Lasts all day and looks very radiant on my skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for several months and like the coverage.  It’s very gentle on my skin and can be used under quite a few different foundations without problems regarding blending, clumping or other chemical reactions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It lasts all day, doesn't  break me out and leaves a lovely glow that isn't greasy. I prefer it over the original as it feels lighter on the skin. I have very sensitive skin and this has been great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried every version of the CC creams - the regular was leaving me a little too dry / matte, and the “glow” version wasn’t quite enough coverage for me. I hoped this would be in-between the two, but for some reason it seems to apply more Camry/patchy than the other formulas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this products medium coverage, application and of course, spf. Due to being a fair girl, the product oxidizes and creates an orange hue. The “illumination” is just glitter and will get all over you Pass for me on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product....but why oh why does sephora always have to charge more than anywhere else for products we can get elsewhere???  I smell a boycott.  Sephora is one of the richest companies for a reason y'all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beats them all! I have mature combo skin with redness. I have tried a ton of foundations and this one is amazing! I keep going back to it because nothing has better performance. Medium coverage. No peeling, smudging, or settling. I do skin prep and use a primer. No settling into pores, covers my redness and provides much needed sun protection. My skin looks dewy and hydrated with that inner glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage! It covers my sunspots. The downfall is it breaks me out. Heavy formulas tend to break me out. My pump is broken now. I'm too far from a Sephora to return. Why isn't there a pump available for purchasing? Too bad I just purchased this a month ago.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC cream! I have very dry skin and have a hard time finding foundations that go well with dry skin. I decided to try this CC cream as I saw reviews that said it was very hydrating. It did not disappoint! it gives me a dewy finish, and I LOVE the glitter! I know glitter isn't for everyone but I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so beautiful on the skin. I was using the glossier and I have to say this one tops it. It hydrates my skin and gives a beautiful glow. It’s very light weight, but I would say the coverage is medium not full. I still recommend this foundation!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Always a fan of It Cosmetics! I have tried and loved the cc cream, this time I opted for the illuminating one and wasn’t disappointed! It’s so beautiful on my skin while also being med/full coverage and that SPF 50 is an absolute plus! gives my skin a beautiful healthy glow without being too glittery

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have a very dry skin type, and I purchased this product to help with skin dryness. After a few hours of applying, it peeled off . I don't recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this but the “illumination” is actual sparkles and it makes you look super greasy. I wanted a more casual every day look for work but the sparkles in it made me look like a snow globe. Not worth the price

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never had so many compliments about how great my skin looks until I started using the CC+ illumination foundation (late 30s). It applies smoothly, I don't require much and it doesn't look like I'm wearing full coverage foundation. My skin is combination, yet paired with a setting spray, it keeps my skin looking radiant all day. I'm surprised by the ratings, so just in case, I'll buy extras!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Order this over and over and over. Full coverage without being cakey, blends well and stays put all day. I have super oily skin and this never makes it worse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using it for a couple of months now, and I love the finish that it gives to my skin. The texture is creamy and it’s really easy to blend, also with a minimum amount of product you get a full cover of your face.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation, I love it during the summer and the high spf is a huge bonus. BUT the new bottle is terrible and bad enough that I probably won't buy another tube of this. The older bottle was much better. The newer tube does not detach from the lid with ease and the result is an explosion of foundation that completely negates how good this foundation is. The foundation explosion ruined my blouse and resulted in having to repaint part of a wall. Not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Shade range is not good, feels heavy, looks heavy, overall not really my fav

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After searching many years to find a product that does not oxidize and turn orange on my very fair, cool, toned skin I finally have found a successful match. I absolutely love the way it makes my skin feel after I wash it off. It feels like I have had a facial on all day. It has a right amount of luminosity that does not make my face look greasy just Dewey! Can’t say enough good about this product I hope they never discontinue it. After purchasing this product, I purchased the concealer and I love it also. It does not settle into the fine lines around my eyes and it looks very very Natural .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Why this doesn’t have more likes I’ll never know. I always have issues finding a shade that doesn’t wash me out or make me look sickly. I glow whenever I wear this and I will never be able to recommend it enough.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore the natural and radiant finish that this CC cream effortlessly imparts to my face. It strikes the perfect balance, offering a lighter feel than foundation yet providing impressive coverage for a flawlessly beautiful look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! It matches my skin tone perfectly and adds a lustrous look while not feeling oily. It also lasts all day without any touch ups needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. I have rosacea and it help me to cover the red with  out the dry looking on my face it is so smooth and give a beautiful illumination look.

reviews.review_title: Staple! Always come back to It Cosmetics!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Die hard It Cosmetucs CC foundation user! I used to use the original formula but switched to the illumination because i wanted something more luminous. So glad that I made the switch. It provides the most glowy and luminous complexion. From very up close you can see very tiny sparkles but it doesn’t bother me. In pictures I look fresh, dewy and have the most luminous glow. I use Glow Recipe watermelon glow underneath and then the CC cream on top. Perfect combination. I only need one pump of the cc cream for a very natural, medium coverage. Doesn’t look cakey at all. I use a beauty blender and setting spray combination. So beautiful, it’s no wonder they always sell out in shades. The spf 50 is a bonus!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is not good for mature skin. It didn’t cover a thing and the illumination is practically none

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All I can say is WOW. matches my skin perfectly. The finish is so nice and radiant. I have combination oily skin and it doesn’t make my skin look oily, it might look shiny a little but i like that. If you don’t like any shine or the luminous look then I don’t suggest going with this one.

reviews.review_title: Good. But over priced.  I don’t know why it’s too.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Good. But over priced.  I don’t know why is it like that. The amount is not that much in the tube.

reviews.review_title: Absolutely the best CC cream out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my daily go to cc cream! I get so many compliments about my skin!

reviews.review_title: Even the lightest shade is too dark
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While the coverage is really good, the color is not. I bought Fair because it's the lightest shade available, and it's still too dark. (For reference, I'm a 006 in KVD Good Apple and a 0.75 in Clinique Even Better Makeup.) If you can find a shade to match your skin tone, it would be a good product, but be warned that the shade range is limited.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cream. I use it as a foundation. I use my fingertips for blending it in- it goes very smoothly and no streaks. I also use a light powder over it and ready to go. Stays all day without any smearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation, I always get compliments whenever I put it on. It’s smooth and gives off a natural look even though it’s full coverage. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me preface; This is illuminating. It is illuminating with Tin-man-esque levels of shimmer that made me (severely dry skin) look greasy and about ten years older. If you are looking for an illuminating and moisturizing base product, Save your self the time and buy the glossier stretch concealer instead; work it into a fluffy brush and lightly blend out. Not so sadly, I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Undertone is awful on this. That oxidized yellowy color that is not even close to the Nude Glow formula, which I daily. I mix it with YSBB foundation for staying power and was hoping this would give a similar effect. I'll just stick to that combo bc sheeesh!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a gift last year and loved it when I was tan over the summer, so I decided to pick up another for when I'm more fair over the winter. I got the shade light, and boy am I disappointed. It's not even a light shade. It's more in the Tan range. When I switched it, it oxidized and turned ORANGE.... yikes! I got this when it was 50% off, so I'm wondering if that's why it was on sale.... it's not supposed to expire until 7/2024, so it's not doing this because it's expired. The formula for the light shade just isn't good. May return it and try it in Fair to see if it's any better. Otherwise, my summer shade is great! I like the coverage and how it looks on the skin. I recommend switching these before buying them.

reviews.review_title: A daily foundation for all occasions
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I’ve used so many foundations and always come back to this one. It makes my skin so beautiful and is medium-full coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My go to that I've been purchasing for a while. I apply it with a sponge or my hands. Brushes make it too heavy/cakey. I don't even have to set it with powder. If I want a more full coverage look, then sometimes I'll set with powder.

reviews.review_title: THIS IS THE ONLY PRODUCT YOU EVER NEED!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used IT cosmetic illumination cc cream and illumination bye bye under eyes for years!! This makes my skin feel so soft, hydrated, and protects against harmful sun rays!! I will never use anything else!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I continue to re purchase this produce it’s awesome

I had tried this product years ago and liked IT, but now I LOVE IT!  At first I thought the color was way off, but then it blended flawlessly. Amazing. Feel like my skin is being protected and nourished at the same time. Absolutely LOVE this product. Not a fan of the price, but you use such a small amount that it probably all works out in the end...

reviews.review_title: A favorite of MANY different tries...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It Cosmetics CC Illumination is IT for me!  The color (medium) is a perfect match for my skin, the coverage lasts all day, and the finish is dewy and healthy looking, especially for a full-coverage foundation.  After so many different brands, high to low, this is my go-to.

reviews.review_title: Nice coverage with out looking dull
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product ! I have very large pores and acne scaring and this product helps give me coverage  with out looking cakey or dull! I love to apply it with a Beauty blender sponge and set it with powder to last all day !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy and buildable coverage. Definitely one of my favourite foundations. It never clings to any dry spots and if I have acne if covers it beautifully. I do have the original and like it but this is just a little more glowy and sheer.

reviews.review_title: I like the regular CC better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I did not enjoy the finish of this CC cream- it was very shiny. The shade I got was very pink, so I would test out the colors in person. Overall, the original is better and has a better, more natural looking finish.

reviews.review_title: Loved it since it came out!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product gives just the right amount of coverage with an illuminating finish. I’m almost 50 and have been wearing it since it came out. I’ve recommended to several women after their compliments and inquiries as to what I use on my face. I live in a humid climate, and my only complaint is it sometimes sweats off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little bit goes a long way and the Illumination part of the foundation leaves my skin glowing! If you don’t like the glowy look you can press some powder on and get a matte look! (;

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great spf, but it’s daley and the shade range is limited. Purchased the medium light shade and it comes off really pink.

reviews.review_title: Best ever once you figure it out!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. My Grandmom turned me on to it when I was complaining about my skin suddenly looking dry and crepey with my previous foundations. I wouldn’t consider it full coverage but it’s definitely color correcting, which I love. It doesn’t hide my freckles but it evens out my skin tone and keeps it looking hydrated and fresh. It is illuminating so I wouldn’t recommend it for anyone who has oily skin. This is best suited for someone who’s face is lacking a natural glow and you definitely don’t need much. A little goes a long way. In the summer, it’s my go-to for the beach/pool with no added make up to give me a natural but even skin tone. Makes my skin look flawless. For work days etc I’ll add a light powder contour and blush and I’m good to go. In the winter I add a setting little powder to my routine to tone down the illumination. There was a learning curve with this stuff for me but once I figured it out, I was sold. If it helps, I treat it more like a tinted moisturizer than I do a full coverage foundation. I don’t think this is suited for anyone looking for that full face make up finish. This is more natural. If I have an event that I want to be more done up, I add a drop of my other full coverage foundation, dab together on the back of my hand and apply. I truly love this stuff.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_text: It looks natural and illuminating when on and better after setting with powder. But the glitters are so difficult to remove completely, which is kind of concerning.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - light brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It wasn't what I wanted. It's not full coverage and my face looks super shiny. Maybe it will work for others but this is not for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This gives good coverage but it’s SO illuminating. I seriously looked like a greasy teenager with a shiny face when I used it. Had to return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best CC cream in my life so far. Trust me because I never leave any reviews unless I get obsessed with something that’s really wonderful. This IT cc cream is a super gentle and light foundation with medium coverage and high performance of SPF 50for daily use. It’s even mild on my oily sensitive skin that rejects many foundation products. Upon a simple application of this CC cream, your skin naturally turns into an ideal shade with a beautiful glowing effect. I bet you won’t regret getting this. Since every penny you spent is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, not for me. I wish to love this product. However, it is causing dryness something that’s never been an issue.

reviews.review_title: Product is fine, if you like it splattered
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is fine, but I cannot tell you how terrible the packaging is. I have ended up with makeup wasted and all over me twice. The cap does not come off easily, and when it does… the entire thing explodes. The prior version of this product, albeit the one without the illuminating pigments, never did this. I’m so disappointed, I’ll actually go back to NARS. You also can’t get the top back on once it’s off. This is just really a nightmare and waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It makes my skin look BEAUTIFUL. Provides great coverage that a lot of dewy foundations don’t. However, the lightest shade was 3 shades too dark, and orange after it oxidized. There’s also glitter in this that I wasn’t aware of until I put it on. So sad this doesn’t work for me.

reviews.review_title: Better for a dryer skin type
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great for a person with dryer skin. I was attempting to try the more glowy and dewy look. However, this product on my skin type-oily/ combo moved around on my skin even with setting powder and spray. It was amazing on my under eyes but I couldn’t make it work over all. It looked great when first applied but not much after that. For reference: I wear medium tan in It Cosmetics. Dior backstage 2WO and Charlotte Tilbury airbrush flawless foundation in 6 warm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good amount of coverage but is almost shimmery instead of glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it, it’s hydrating. It was a bit of shimmer but it looks beautiful on the skin. Can wait to wear it during the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this during the 50% sale because I love the original cc cream. If the original one works for you, please stick to it. The illumination is not only dewy or shimmery… it’s GLITTERY. As if you mix the original one with glitter shadow dust… accentuate texture and the glitter is not even spread evenly across the face. Just run gurl run!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!  Coverage is full - heavier than a tint.  It evens out my skin tone nicely.  Best of all, it includes physical sunscreen, not chemical.  My derm recommended physical sunscreen, but it's often hard to blend.  Not so with this product.  And, the illuminating feature is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this bc it was not only on sale but I loveeeee the orig cc by it! I literally use the orig one everyday and it’s by far my fave foundation i’ve used. I didn’t care for this one as much. I didn’t find it full coverage and I felt like it didn’t blend as well and felt splotchy… I will probably not buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this, and I gave it 3 stars for the high SPF content and good ingredients. However, it broke me out TERRIBLY! Going to have to return this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Yes! Dewy glowing skin. It feels good on the skin, like I have nothing on. I normally have oily skin but it’s been more combination skin lately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent coverage and good protection against bad sun rays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I needed something to protect my skin & this product just oxidizes so well into my skin. I apply it like a face cream, and the finished product is amazing. I could use this for a date night if I wanted to. LOVE LOVE LOVE - 1st review ever, but had to with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased the IT Cosmetics CC cream before but this time I purchased the Fair Light.  I have very light skin and this color blended into an orange tone which was awful and looked much worse!  The CC cream also set into my lines to the point that no about of buffing, setting spray or reapplication proved to be acceptable.  Unfortunately, I had worn this as we had gone out of town and once our 1.5 drive was completed, I looked in the mirror as to the horror that was upon my face that I so carefully crafted, all with my usual steps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great color match, great coverage. Easy to apply. Does not feel heavy. Others can not even tell I am wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this illuminating one!! I have tried the matte one and this one is so much better! It blends beautifully with a brush and provides light/medium coverage. However, it is very easy to go heavy handed with this product. It perfects my skin while adding a beautiful radiance. There is a noticeable shimmer, but I love it!! I have a combo type skin but this foundation sets beautifully under power. All in all, I def recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i cannot stop buying it! it is perfect for my dry skin which i feel plumped and since it enhances my real skin color it is both in winter than in summer season without need to buy a darker one for summer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne-prone skin, so using this product is great if you want light coverage that does not feel cakey. I thought it would be too orange, but once you blend it out all over your face, it sets in beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using a CC cream and I actually love it. It’s perfect for days when I don’t want to goop on a full face of makeup. I surprisingly like the illuminating effect and it doesn’t make you look shiny but rather a bit sunkissed or glowy. I use a primer underneath first and love the application, haven’t worn without primer. I do use some powder over it since I tend to get oily throughout the day. Would definitely purchase again and anticipate using a lot during the summertime!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product!  I have such sun damage on my face and this covers all of those dark spots and imperfections.  It gives you a healthy and even toned look!  It products are simply the best products for aging and sun damaged skin. I highly recommend if you are on the fence order It products!!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the color and match to my skin tone. SPF is also a plus. However, I looked so shiny and felt greasy all day! Won’t continue using this one :-(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It does what it says it'll do. I bought because it was $29 on sale and it has SPF 50. I'm fair-skinned so SPF in my foundation is just an awesome bonus. The shade Fair Light is a good match for me. However, I'm not sure how I feel about the ~illumination~. I'm in my mid-30s and feel like these foundations with glowy/dewy finishes just end up looking greasy on my face. This one feels a bit heavy, too.   Good coverage if that's what you're after, but I think I might prefer the original CC cream if it has a more natural finish. Guess I'll have to try that one!

reviews.review_title: My new fave all-in-one skincare makeup!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Problem: I’m fair so I always wear sunscreen on my face but my foundation doesn’t last all day on top or underneath. Solution: This CC cream. I’ve tried other IT CC creams but always felt the coverage was too heavy for my skin. Not this one! It gives me full coverage but feels very light on my skin. It looks and feels great for 8-10 hours without any touch ups. The illumination part seemed a little much (haven’t used any before) but has gotten me so many positive comments that my skin looks “fantastic” or “you are positively radiant” I’m hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a nice finish. Not too sparkly, but a healthy glow. Not very heavy looking even though it’s a full coverage foundation, but doesn’t necessarily stay on for 12 hours/all day. Covers well, lightweight, beautiful finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This feels and covers much like the regular It CC+ cream, but gives a dewier finish.  One important note:  the medium shade of this product is lighter than medium in the regular CC+ cream!  I'll probably mix the two products together to get the right shade for my skin.... See photo....

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Overall, I really like this CC cream but I do have some mixed feelings about it. Firstly, it is so so sparkly. Yes, I know it's the illumination version, but I was hoping for more of a healthy glow than straight up glitter. The good news is that from afar it does appear to be more of a healthy glow. The amount of coverage seems similar to the original version (it's been years since I've tried that one, though) - it's seriously impressive. It makes my skin look amazing. Another downside though is that it has a citrus-y scent. If this had less glitter and less of a scent it would be a HG product for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Grabbed this when it was on sale for $29! I can truly say that this is a great product, however I’m not sure if I’d ever spend more than $30 on this and considering it retails for $42… idk. I previously have only used low end bb/cc cream so this my first time with a higher end one. Not sure how to feel honestly because I’m not blown away but it is by no means a bad product. I LOVE the finish of it, its slightly glowy and sparkly. However its really thick and doesn’t feel hydrating. It gives a glow but it dries a bit so it feels matte with a wash of sparkle over it if that makes sense. Still gives a lovely finish I just wish it stayed dewy/hydrated.  The reason why I rated this high is because of the amazing skincare benefits. I just figure that if I am wearing makeup I might as well have a high spf and anti aging properties! Also this product smells amazing upon application, like oranges, but at the end of the day when I took it off with a makeup wipe it smelled spoiled. Also the shade fair is described as having a yellow undertone, however it pulls very neutral/grey. Was very disappointed since I have a yellow undertone and was hoping it would be accurate however it does thankfully blend out well enough to match my skin. Theres just so much good about this product but the few bad things prevent me from giving it a full 5. If I ever find something better I won’t repurchase but for the mean time this is my daily product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this product is sooo bomb!!!!! ITS A DREAM COME TRUEEEEEE love the smell and the sparkelssssss sooo good! deff recommend!!! but for light coverage onlyy!! prab not ur best choice if u dealing with bad acne:(((

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Lasts all day. Gives me a glow and best of all it has spf! Definitely better for those with slightly dry skin bc the illumination gives a nice dewy glow that is not too oily. Took 1 star off because IT cosmetics changes their bottles recently and it’s significantly less product for the same price :/. As a loyal customer for years I was disappointed to see this

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ugh. I have no idea what I would do without this product. The shade match, the way it sits with/on my dry skin is just amazing. Luckily, my skin isn’t problematic so the coverage is beyond enough for me and one pump goes a long way. I recently got the charlotte tilbury perfect skin foundation hoping to have a backup just in case i ever need it….. boy was I disappointed on another level. I tried doing my skincare different, used a different primer, and came to a conclusion that absolutely nothing besides this specific cc cream works for me. My skin is extremely dry. Sahara desert dry. This product does it all and more. I’m on my 9th tube. I wish I could remember who recommended this/which worked suggested this for my skin… but I love you.

reviews.review_title: watered down version of their normal CC
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased based off of Lauryn Bosttick’s rave reviews. It doesn’t provide much coverage and I did not feel it illuminated my skin. I preferred a tinted sunscreen to using this. Returned.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hides my redness on my face.I would recommend.I have been using this for 2-3 months now

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Working on my 2nd tube if this stuff. It’s the perfect consistency and color match! Prone to acne, this doesn’t irritate at all.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I did not care for this product, coverage was minimal I should have gone with what I came in for and not what was suggested.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! If you want glowing, healthy, looking skin with good coverage this is it. It doesn't look at all cakeyz it covers my redness well and makes me look so radiant. I get compliments on my skin when I wear this. I don't get the reviews saying it's glittery. I don't see glitter. It's more light reflecting and dewy looking to me.

reviews.review_title: Good coverage but not very illuminating
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely coverage but not as illuminating/dewy as I thought it would be. The “illumination” is mostly just sparkles in the cc cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I try a CC cream and illumination finish as well. I loved it, it makes your skin glow and look healthy. My go to has always been matte, and now I prefer this finish. The coverage is good too, I can honestly say I see the color correcting working throughout the whole day. It always stood its ground after a crying session, I thought it’d be smeared or spotted and to my surprise I couldn’t even tell, no one would be able to tell. It’s a plus that it comes with spf coverage, I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too little coverage, switching back to the original.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good product. It really neutralizes any redness and goes on and stays on well. It is an excellent replacement for the discontinued Smashbox Camera Ready BB product. The only reason for knocking off a star is that the illumination in the formula is a bit much. I look pretty shiny when I use it rather than just glow-y. But I love everything else about this product, so I've  ordered the regular, non-illumination version. For now, I've been adding a teeny drop of this into my old BB cream and that has given a nice boost to my skin. But on it's own we're veering into Twilight sparkling face syndrome, at least for this 57 yo broad. haha.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a fan of this. I don’t have a ton of experience with CC creams, but this did not wear well on my face. Accentuated texture, the shade range is limited and falls a bit flat. I plan to exchange for the Fenty Eazedrops.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this because I love the It line of foundations. However, when I went to open it, the entire silver cap and pump part came off. I didn't pull hard, just pulled it off like my other It makeup.  In the process, the makeup went flying, ruining and staining my carpet and my leggings. I washed the leggings 3x with stain remover, but still didn't come out. And the carpet stain will not come out either. I tried a little of the make up and liked it. Was just very unsatisfied with the packaging/bottle.

reviews.review_title: The Best Foundation for Aging Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my mid-forties and my skin has been changing. It's getting drier with more texture and most foundations just don't look good on me anymore. I have tried the best rated and most expensive foundations and this is the very best for my normal to dry aging skin. It looks beautiful on my skin while covers imperfections without looking cakey. If you are looking for a foundation that is hydrating, has good coverage, and looks lovely on your skin all day, look no further.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation cream sucks. It is so patchy and oxidizes within a few hours. I don’t approve of this formulation. But I like how they add the anti aging serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color was too dark. I matched it in store but they were out of stock. I ordered online but the color wasn’t as good at home - maybe different lighting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this product is too thick and heavy on my face. it looks like I have tons of makeup on while wearing it..too sticky as well that I cant apply my blusher. I should have returned it but I was giving it a try. Never buying again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My every day go to! Very full coverage. Luminous color.  Blurs imperfections. Non-drying. Not having to apply a separate sunscreen is definitely a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not not expect DEEP to be so light. The have to mix this product with a nyx mix in dark to get the look I need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I have very fair skin and the Fair shade is perfect and it creates a very natural dewy illuminated finish.  I like this better than the regular CC cream as I find it looks more natural but still covers imperfections.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love “It’s CC cream” & Heavenly brush. I watched the video for guidance and my results were lovely. Great coverage.

reviews.review_title: Great coverage and easy/quick to apply!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cc cream! It truly gives full coverage but is very moisturizing and natural looking without feeling cakey. I use a translucent setting powder with it and it's a great combination. Because the pigment is rich and the formula is creamy, I can apply this foundation very quickly for a fast makeup routine which is what I love about this - easy and quick to apply!

reviews.review_title: “this is the skin of a killer, Bella”
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used foundation since I started my makeup journey at 12 years old. A decade later, I take a chance on CC cream and I am NEVER GOING BACK. I love being shiny and glowy and it’s so much harder to look cakey with this. Love it. Only bad thing about this product is the WEAKKKK shade range.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Only makeup I have ever used was mascara, eye liner and lip gloss. I went to Sephora in deptford mall and I’m so glad I did. Firstly, Mya was incredible! I’m a very shy person and she made me feel so comfortable and able to talk about what I wanted even tho I didn’t know anything about anything lol. Ok so for product review- this was incredible. It covered everything and gave me an even skin tone without feeling heavy or looking cakey. It’s like a 2nd skin. An illuminated, ever perfect 2nd skin. Buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10 the only foundation I use. It’s not full coverage but it’s buildable. Use a damp sponge instead of a brush. I promise this formula isn’t as bad as the other reviews say!! I mean, it literally even holds up to tears running down your face from crying and doesn’t leave streaks.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - light brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this formula, but I would recommend the regular CC cream over this one. For some reason, the shimmer in this looks really obvious and I don't love the disco ball feel. I would probably use some dewy product (I like using the SAIE highlighter) in addition to the regular CC cream if you wanted the same effect minus the glitter everywhere.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this products for over 5yrs now, and still loving it. It make my face look fresh & luminous in the same time even on my tired day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly did not think this would work for me. Surprise surprise it does!!!  I’m a mid brown with gold, not yellow, undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage. Have purchased again and will continue to use as my foundation. A little bit goes a long way and it will not wear off throughout the day/night.

reviews.review_title: Nice CC cream but Fair Light not so ‘light’
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice coverage; spreads easily. Does not feel too heavy. It moisturizes which I like and has great SPF protection.  The only drawback for me is the ‘color’. I have pale skin with blue undertones so I purchased the Fair Light with cool/blue undertones. (The lightest they offer). Sadly, even though ‘light’ it’s darker than I’d like. To fix this, I mix a drop of my regular moisturizer with the CC cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t love this. The shine is from sparkles. I thought it’s going to be glossy/glowing. Instead it feels like teenage makeup with lots of shine. Didn’t last long either even after make up setting spray (I use urban decay). Disappointing! Wanted to love it though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After endless searching for something that miraculously makes my skin look perfect, this is it. I know this sounds far fetched, but if you knew me on Yelp, you’d know I’m a  tough critic, but this stuff really delivers. As long as make sure you match your shade, which there are so many it’s hard not to, it basically acts like a complexion corrector. And as someone who doesn’t regularly wash my face (I know) I never break out or get pimples. I really truly think this is an amazing product. I’ve tried so many expensive foundations and nothing looks as flawless as this. My friends and coworkers have said things like “you obviously don’t wear any make up, other than eyeliner” and I’m like, really? You know it’s good when nobody can tell you’re wearing it. And for the record, I’m not some “influencer” who gets this stuff for free; I pay for it and it’s worth every cent.  Oh and I have very normal skin :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite foundation!! It is great for dry skin. I tried the regular it cosmetics cc cream and it was awful on my skin, super dry and flaky. But this one covers everything with very little product and leaves my skin looking hydrated and dewy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for years! I’ve tried other ones and always come back to this brand. Great coverage but light weight enough to wear every day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice! Subtle glow with buildable coverage. Looks like less coverage than the matte IT cosmetics CC+ cream. Would recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did not tell any difference with using this one and the original one. Both works the same, and I love all of them. I would purchase original one in the future, but they works the same way. Recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much !! It has great coverage without feeling too thick  and has SPF 50 ! I get so many compliments on how smooth and clear my skin looks.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: CC+ generally has good products but I am disappointed with this one. I was told by the sales lady that illumination will give you more glow, only to realize it has glitter in it. Which made me uncomfortable, especially wearing it at work.  It also claims to conceal dark spots and give good coverage. On the contrary, my dark spots were highlighted and more visible. The product itself is dry and heavy, which makes your skin look patchy making every pore visible.  I will be returning this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My go to CC cream, gives me the perfect glow and just the right amount of coverage.

reviews.review_title: soft & dewy, but beware of shimmer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to. However, I did not originally realize this has shimmer in it, which I took one star off for. It’s not terribly noticeable, but enough for me to question if I had accidentally gotten highlighter mixed in my foundation. The shimmer is kind of unnecessary because the formula is really nice and dewy. I like this formula better than the original, so I will continue to purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I went in wanting to purchase the original formula but the sales lady convinced me to buy this one instead. She said it would be better for the summer. The coverage is actually pretty good but it does have shimmer in it which I did not like. I’ll be returning it and getting the original formula as I should’ve done in the first place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will say this is the absolute perfect item to wear on a day you want some protection and a natural look. It blends well into the skin, it’s light and soft. Doesn’t make you feel dry or oily. I wear this if I’m going to be out on the water all day and want minimum coverage with a natural look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not sure whether I should give this a 3 or a 4 star. I thought that maybe because it is illuminating that it would be dewy like the original but it’s actually not dewy at all, it does have a shimmer in it that I am not too fond of and the coverage is not as good as the original. I’d prefer to use the original with a really good powder and highlight because it looked like I had it highlight all over my face and just not my personal preference. Still looked ok.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand and the CC+ Cream but this illumination formula I’m not in love with. It’s a bit more glittery than giving a glow and iridescence like I was hoping for. Still gives good coverage and blends well and love the SPF in it. I personally will stick with the standard formula going forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was really disappointed in this CC cream.  The product claims to be radiant and full coverage.  It clings to dry patches and isn't radiant- it's just filled with glitter.  Once it's dried down, you're left with patchy and weird glittery foundation.  I would say this is more of a medium coverage and it doesn't last throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. This leave my face with a beautiful glowing finish. Great coverage, easy to blend. Goes great with IT concealer

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The skin is left with a soft brightness. I love this product, I recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC Cream . Supper light wight on skin . I am the kind of person who can not wear foundation because I feel that I can not breath with foundation on my skin , but this CC Cream is soooo light and it gives me a good coverage at the same time really in love with it , finally I can wear a foundation again .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product gave my skin a glow that is hard to achieve with my dry skin! It blends beautifully and looks natural!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I so wanted to like this product however it just climbed onto all my pores and dry patches. I’m acne prone and I have the driest skin along with skin texture and it just brought all the flaws I wanted to hide, out. It defiantly does have the illuminosity and glow to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best and I’ve tried a bunch! It goes on beautifully, covers everything, is light and bright. Covers all the spots on my face . I cannot say enough. And a little goes a long way so it’s a great value . Look at my face compared to my neck. I am 65. ( ugh) this takes years off me .

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this CC cream when it first became popular and it’s only gotten better. The added shade Fair-light is a much better match and the illumination adds a dewy look while being lightweight. Also love the SPF! I had worn this while on hiking dates and stayed on through the sweat haha

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones

I’ve also noticed I’ll get a zit or two the day after wearing this, so keep that in mind if you’re acne-prone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Awesome coverage. Melts into the skin and does not look like makeup throughout the day, but isn’t necessarily dewy or sticky either. It has a radiant yet flawless appearance. The little sparkles don’t really bother me, they do not distract from your skin at all. I love the shade medium, it’s a neutral shade on the lighter side for a medium (I’m an olive nc20-25). I think the neutral undertones of the shades are amazing because they blend into so many skin tones so well. The only con I have is the scent :(

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I bought a cream today, by the way there was no discount (Black Friday) and it turned out to be expired (11/2020).  you don't care about your customers and your reputation! So bad!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! And I've used MANY.   What I love;  -Medium buildable coverage but not heavy looking. Hides my melasma.  -Not oily. I have combination skin and prone to break outs. This does not give me a oil slick or break out my skin  -It gives you a nice radiant (youthful) glow, without oils. As others mentioned it has glitter in it. This is very, very tiny light reflecting particles, and they are really not noticeable unless you are inspecting your face. Makes my 38 year old skin look like its in its 20's again.   What I don't like;  Although it doesnt smudge off easily, it does smudge off if you blow your nose for example. (fortunately, you can apply more without it looking caked on).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was expecting the illumination to come from hydrating ingredients....not from glitter. The glitter is a deal breaker for and returned back to the original version and spray tatcha dewy mist on top to get the illumination instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There’s glitter in this? I’m confused why is there glitter? I love the original it cosmetics  cc cream but for winter it’s too dry so I wanted to try out the illumination to see if hydrates my skin better for the winter. I can say that it does keep my skin from drying out and I feel like the coverage can be full or medium. I use this as an everyday makeup look but I wouldn’t wear it for a night out or if I needed it to last all day as it wears off. It’s a great cc cream besides the glitter lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked how moisturizing this is, but the coverage is very watery. Not sure how to describe it. It doesn't settle onto your skin and feels like it moves around and transfers very easily unless you set it completely, which then makes it look a bit cakey. The scent was very strong and floral which I think made my skin get itchy too. I think this is definitely not suited for anyone under 40 years old.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: good coverage but it has GLITTER in it. I know the name says illumination but I was not prepared for a glittery CC cream.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones

I do add a press powder that is more matte on areas that I don’t want my face to look oily. I actually prefer this over the regular cc cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: My HG Foundation for the Past Few Years...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In terms of formula, this has been my HG for the past few years. I have dry-combo skin, that's sensitive, acne-prone, and I have mild rosacea. This foundation doesn't irritate my skin, break me out, and gives consistent medium, buildable coverage. I am consistently complimented on my skin every time I wear it. It feels thick initially, but a little goes a long way and I'll double up on the areas that need it.  My only gripe: FAIR IS TOO DARK FOR ME & slightly oxidizes! It's probably 2 shades too dark but I make it work so I don't have a line on my face/neck. Still...IT cosmetics -- expand this range!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones

Also it is made with safer ingredients than most when it came to the SPF.

reviews.review_title: Finally, a really good CC Cream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After reading several negative reviews, I purchased this illuminating cream - only slightly worried it would appear too sparkly or glittery.  On the contrary, it is gorgeous!  Applied to clean and lightly moisturized skin using a quality face brush, the coverage is light-medium and buildable.  It does have a healthy dewy sheen but no glittery or sparkly at all.  Nothing over the top or trashy at all.  After a day's wear, I am totally loving how my skin looks, paired with the IT Bye Bye Under Eye Concealer in the lightest shade.   I'm back to review and purchase another tube for my favorites stash.  Pleasant, fresh smell, easily applied, my skin looks so nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this for a moisturizing foundation replacement. Great coverage with dewy finish. I prefer this to the original because it’s the tiniest bit sheer and I like the illumination. Saves a me a few minutes in my morning routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE It Cosmetics! I have dry skin and struggle to find good coverage thats not cakey and dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product! I've been searching for a foundation that wasn't too heavy, cakey, and would last a long time. This has everything I wanted - a nice luminous finish, long lasting, and looks very natural. I will say I've had people tell me I look sparkly when out in the natural light, but if that doesn't bother you then it's a great fit! It's easy to build and the color matches almost perfectly. I tried the original It CC Cream and that was way too matte and heavy for what I like.Coming from a girl who has acne, fair skin, freckles and redness, it's been a long time to finally find a product that actually works well with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing quick natural product if you just want an even skin tone. I tried using with concealer and powder and my skin got flaky in Florida humidity sooooo I would only use it on its own or nothing. PLUS a little goes a long way with it so it is worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: really regret buying this, I should've stuck with the original. I wouldn't call this a dew at all, there was literally glitter on my face EVERYWHERE, way more than in the locations you wanted illuminated. also broke my skin out so badly :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product itself. Texture, color, smell, coverage, but it gave me awful breakouts(

reviews.review_title: Great for every day, high SPF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this CC cream for everyday makeup. I have tried the original in the past and liked it, but this one gives a dewier finish which I prefer. This is the perfect lazy girl makeup (me) because you can use it as a base and concealer. The shade range is not great, its not a perfect color match but its close enough to give some good coverage and even everything out. I would not consider this FULL coverage, maybe the matte version is, but this one is more light to medium. I have dry skin but this one doesn't flake and pill like the original did on me, why I stopped using. I sheer it out with my fingers over most of my face and add a lil more in trouble spots. Great SPF protection with decent coverage, perfect for the summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love it. this CC cream provides a sheer but buildable coverage. I mix 1 pump with my face moisturizer for a soft dewy look that doesn't cake and flake since I have dry skin. the illumination settles down after 30 mins of wearing and you just look radiant. a couple people did ask me if I was wearing shimmer or glitter but it was rare. I love cc creams for all the added benefits and this one is my fave for a daytime mfbb (my face but better) look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cc cream was reviewed as being the end all, be all for a lot of people. I should have paid more heed to the reviews that mentioned the orange color. I went with the fair light, even though my skin is very pale, because it was supposed to be for cool undertones. This first time that I used this, I knew this was a no go for me. It went on way too dark, and continued to darken as it oxidized to a nice pumpkin color. Gave three stars , because I really liked the way it felt , and the glow it gave my skin. If IT cosmetics would expand their shades, and include something for all us cool porcelain skinned ladies, I'd probably give this another try. Am returning product, and will continue my search for my holy grail, foundation.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The one star reviewers are confusing me. I have NEVER seen glitter in this product. It illuminates, just as it says it does.. it adds a nice natural glow to your skin. I LOVE this foundation. I love the original CC cream & since I love anything that will add glow to my skin I figured I’d give this a shot. It’s not full coverage but it’s buildable. I think it has great coverage for it being a CC cream! I don’t like full coverage, I want something that will look like my skin but better and this product is it. This product feels light on my skin and is breathable and I don’t feel guilty wearing it to the gym.

reviews.review_title: Not horrible, but not the best

The illumination is a little too much so next time I think I will get the regular one. I decided to keep it after adjusting how much I use!

I tried sheering it out, building it up, different application methods, just could not get myself to like it and had to return it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones

I only docked a star because I am quite fair and the fair shade is just a touch darker than I’d prefer. But I just blend really well along my hairline, and it works well. Highly recommend!
