reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this looks lovely once you put it on, but about five minutes after it gets tanner and splotchy. i really wanted this foundation to work but it was a real waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this CC Cream, however, it just didn’t work for me. It is quite illuminating but not necessarily dewy. It didn’t settle right on my skin (combination of oily/dry). It looked as if I wet my hands and applied the foundation on my face. Also, the color That was recommended to me- light médium- made my yellow undertones look even more yellow (reference: I usually use Clinique’s Superbalanced in 04 cream chamois). In terms of coverage, I would say it’s a medium coverage- definitely buildable- but it just made me look caked up. Plus when adding concealer under my eyes, it made me look so much older than my 28 year old self. This is a no for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little too illuminating on its own. If you use too much it may look a little greasy/tin man face. I like to use it as a mixer with other foundations to add a subtle glow. Great for the summertime when you're going to the pool or out in the sun and you don't want a full face of make up but you don't want to be completely bare faced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this as I enjoyed the matte version and love a good Illuminator so thought this was a non-brainer. Found this to be more full versus medium coverage, felt very thick and greasy. Going back to Giorgio Armani- I keep trying other things but Armani foundation is just the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally had the matte version of this but wanted something a little more glowy during the colder months. This worked well but was very sheer by itself so I either mix it with the matte version or another tinted moisturizer to dilute some of the sheerness. Other than that it is a good product.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my makeup bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go to foundation now that I have stuck with. I’ve tried a lot of foundations, and there are a lot of good ones, but this one is my favorite. It offers really good coverage while still feeling light and looking natural. It basically just makes me look like I have naturally flawless, glowing skin. I love the illuminating aspect of this one, compared to the matte. And the best part is, it also has spf! So I know I’m protected being out in the sun and don’t have to put sunscreen on if I have this. It actually feels like it nourishes and moisturizes your skin rather than drying it out! Will continue to purchase this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You get a lot of product. I just wished I liked the product. As soon as it's applied, it looks like a greasy, shiny mess. No coverage and the foundation just sinks into pores. There are just too many amazing and less costly complexion perfectors out there.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve bought this product several times. I use it in the summer and it gives a beautiful finish that lasts all day. I apply with a damp sponge and it gives great coverage. Will continue to purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation like most of the it cosmetics products is amazing, coverage all day, doesn't crease, and doesn't break me out. The illumination is subtle but perfect!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this product but felt it was too heavy on my skin. Had used Laura Mercier Tinted Illuminating Mositurizer for years and needed a new alternative now that it has been discontinued.  Was suggested to try this in the Sephora store.  Good alternative but just so much heavier and cake like looking on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This one is a good one but I prefer to use on winter time because of the glitter.you just need half of the pump for the whole face

reviews.review_title: Good product, bad shade range, oxidizes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product for the fact that it's full coverage, looks great on the skin, and covers my redness. However the lightest shade was way to orange and dark for my skin tone. I had to put on a lot of powder to correct this issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this to get away from powder foundation.  I ordered Medium Tan.  Was pretty excited to try it. First thing I noticed is that you don't need 1-2 pumps.  I ended up (on the second day of use) dabbing it on my face from a drop on my hand. It goes on fairly well.  However, I made a mistake in choosing the Illumination product.  It is so shiny all over, it's just a bit too much.  Also, my fiancé noticed I had on a shade that was one shade too dark. He could see the color difference and I blended and blended to try and make sure that didn't happen.  I will try this one more time in the matte, and if it doesn't work, I'll stick to BareMinerals Golden Medium power foundation which I have been using for years.  Also, it's thick to remove when you wash your face.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it , i got the primer with it to. It gives great coverage without cloging my poors. It makes my poors look smaller and it stays on all day. No cacking no dry spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Covers imperfections , perfect to keep on my handbag , and has a glow ... recommend using dry cities and winter time

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many foundations but this is by far the best. It gives me a glow which I need at my advanced age and it has SPF 50 which is great for this SoCal weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to like this. I love a good glow but this is more glitter than anything. I was matched with a shade that was too light as well. But the major deal breaker was that it broke me out so bad. It does go on smoothly and has buildable coverage but not good for sensitive or acne prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this, as I wanted to try and branch out to a CC cream with a higher SPF than my usual 15 SPF CC cream, but the smell of this is pretty overwhelmingly unattractive and it doesn't blend well into my skin, primer or no.  The coverage is heavy enough that I could almost call it a foundation, since it covers up my freckles, which is something that my other CC cream doesn't do (and I like that).  I can't say I care for the color as well, but since I picked based on the pictures provided on the computer and not based on actually going into the stores, I can't fault it for that.  It was a bit orangey on my skin; I got Fair Light and best I can tell, maybe I should have gone for Fair.  However, given that I don't like the smell of it, I probably won't give the Fair a shot.  I'm sure this would work fantastic for someone who is looking for a slightly heavier coverage CC cream with a nice SPF number, who doesn't mind the smell and is either better at blending or doesn't need too much that it needs to be blended much.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love! I use this every morning to ensure I have on my 50 SPF and gives me a nice shine during the day. Has not caused any breaks outs and keeps my fave moisturized without looking oily.

reviews.review_title: Not bad but visible dry spots.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this CC goes on.  It’s light weight and blendable.  I like the slight shimmer that makes my skin naturally dewy and that the SPF doesn’t break me out.  Only concern is at end of day, I see all my dry spots from blemishes.  I’m surprised it does that, because it works well first few hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Im over 50 and this is the BEST foundation I have found since Estee Lauder Double Wear became too drying for my skin. I use both the Illumination and regular IT CC. I find that for me, it is necessary to apply with fingers..This also seems to run a shade too dark once settled so I always buy a shade lighter than normal LOVE this foundation

reviews.review_title: Nice foundation but darker than pictured
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is really pretty, the formula is nice and has good coverage. Looking at the photos of the foundation colors fair light looked like a good match and fair looked a little too light for me. Sadly fair light is a lot darker than pictured and looks a bit orange on me☹️ bad judgment on my part I suppose. A wider shade range would be nice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this product but it wasn’t as I expected. First the color is wrong, I bought neutral medium and it wasn’t neutral but too warm. It doesn’t wear well through the day and looks bad after a few hours. The worst part? It’s soooo glittery. People aren’t joking you look like a disco ball and I love Illumination but that’s not this product. I love it cosmetics but do not recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation gave great coverage all day! I didn’t feel like I needed to touch up at the end of the day if I was going out for the evening. Shimmer was just enough. And the anti aging is a bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation gives great coverage without looking cakey. At first I thought the shimmer was going to be too much, but once I applied my finishing powder it was just perfect! Stays on all day and evening, looks super nice and the fact that it is anti-aging is a bonus!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What can I say... I am officially an IT Cosmetics fan! I have tried all of their CC creams, and I love this version for winter or during times where my skin is more on the dry side. It’s surprisingly hydrating, and doesn’t crack over time. Used this on a daily, and with a setting spray it lasted almost the whole day with no touch ups. Personally, it’s a little too glowy at times, (because of my combination skin) and I just dab a bit of the CC cream compact powder and my complexion is all set! A great substitute for foundation.  Another plus point is that upon removal, my skin looked glowy and healthy! Maybe it’s the serum? Whatever it is, I’m loving it.  The only cons is that at first, the consistency feels a little thick, but hey a little goes a long way AND it feels lighter over time.

reviews.review_title: Like it! But too “glittery” for allowed full cover
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the consistency, I like the pump and the tube it comes in. Coverage is lighter than most full coverage foundation to one. Great feel and texture. The only reason I took a star is because it’s a little too “glittery” for me. I kept it, but I usually only use on eyelids and highlighting cheeks. The illumination is a turnoff as it gets everywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just ok. Not bad, just not great. Thrive Causemetics CC is better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cream to wear! It gives me the right amount of color, covers my rosacea, and has a highlighter in it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very sensitive combination skin. I tend to break out very easily with certain foundations/products. However, this works WONDERS!!! Not only does it cover any existing breakouts/discoloration it also is moisturizing enough that it won’t cake up on your breakouts! I 100% would recommend this product that anybody!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For dry skin ONLY, but wow I love this product. I used MAC forever but this is such much silkier, richer, and the coverage is great without having to use much. It feels light on my skin and stays out for a long time. Not sure why some reviews say it’s greasy and heavy. If you have dry skin like me, you’ll be thankful for the hydration!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the thickest, cakiest foundation I’ve ever put on my face. When you put it on you fee like scratching it off from being so heavy and greasy.  Better off buying nars radiant longwear

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Aside from having to make sure that you use a primer and plenty of moisturizer before hand, the coverage is great! Nice sparkly finish!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this brand had a variety of shades to better match skin tones as I was having trouble finding a tinted moisturizer with sunscreen that blended well into my skin. I like that in theory this is a one step option for moisturizer, sunscreen, and light coverage. I don’t notice a big illuminating effect, and this does sometimes leave my skin feeling dried out, even after I’ve applied another moisturizer underneath. It’s not bad, but I may look for another option when this tube is done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: BEST foundation ever. Goes on iike silk and gives great coverage. I use Lancome loose power over it then when makeup is complete, I put a tiny bit of foundation over nose and cheeks then spray with setting spray. It gives a nice glow and is great for mature skin. Oh! I am 82.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like the consistency of this product but I wouldn’t call it “illumination”, more like “a whole bunch of glitter in a cream that goes EVERYWHERE”

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - light brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Mix feelings about the It cosmetics cc cream.  Even though the coverage is amazing, I feel like a grease ball when I'm wearing this.  It transfers to everything and that could be a little bit annoying.  Many people love it, but it gets very oily through out the day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this product last year and still use it! For mature, dry skin, it provides great coverage, gives me a glow, sun protection (a MUST!), and a flawless finish to my skin. I have other foundations, but this one always gets replenished.

reviews.review_title: for mature skin, this stuff rocks!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this has changed everything. amazing little light reflecting particles mask all the imperfections without feeling like a mask at all. i will be buying on repeat. love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking to replace my old Erborian CC cream and I like this product much better! The shade is a good match for my neutral undertone and can be applied sheer or built up to a medium coverage (definitely not full coverage). It makes the skin looks glowy without glittery particles, the lasting power is great, and application is very quick and effortless with a sponge. The inclusion of SPF is nice since it helps protect the skin while not causing flashback in photos. The shade range sucks, which is a shame since this product works so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It feels so light on but has very good full coverage. Love the luminous finish it has.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love combining a half pump of this with a half pump of their regular CC  Cream.  Sometimes the Illumination of this formula is just too much for my oily skin type.  I love that it's buildable and helps even out my skin tone.  Somedays I want more full coverage and other's I just want to even out my skin tone a little bit.  I have adult acne, very fair skin, acne scars and melasma, and this helps give me an even, dewy appearance.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Says to use 2-3 pumps, I only used one, can’t imagine if I’d used the suggested amount.  Let my face at the end of the day and greasy shiny mess, could not wait to get home to wash my face, really wanted to love it as it looks great for about the first hour.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is moisturizing and light but yet provides amazing coverage.  I've never used anything like it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wore this foundation and my husband asked why I had glitter all over my face. Wish it was more hydrating instead of the glitter. Will be exchanging for the original

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will give 5 stars if it has a little more coverage than the other one.  it has a little shine in it, so when I put on my skin shines, look pretty natural shine compare to those shimmers. but since its CC  cream illumination, if I want to have high coverage I will put on the light foundation first then put this on a little make my skin have a natural glow.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in hopes of having a luminous glow but what I got was a face covered in glitter. I despise this foundation more and more every time I use it. Besides the fact there is an obscene amount of glitter in this it has terrible coverage, gets patchy quickly no matter how I use it, and clings to every line and dry patch I have on my face. I’m only 24 but this foundation makes my skin look so bad. If you don’t want to look like you jumped into a pool of glitter then this foundation isn’t for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: While I do love the coverage of this product, and the subtle and light shimmer it gives to your skin, I’ve had issues with a couple of things.  1. The type of dispenser doesn’t allow you to get all of the product out when you are running low. I cut the tube open and actually got 2 more weeks out of it! Bonus. 2. The metallic label tends to flake when it rides around it your make up bag (I travel for a living) so then that flake transfers to your fingers and ends up on your face when you apply. ( I use my fingertips, not a sponge or brush.) I have written It! but have not received a response. Otherwise, I love this product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it has a nice finish really leaves skin feeling nice nice natural finish

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just purchased this product after hearing so many great reviews on the CC cream. I decided to try the illuminating formula because I need all the help I can get with a newborn! Love the coverage - I would call it medium and prefer and sponge over a brush application. However, I will be purchasing the regular formula next time. The illuminating formula leaves me with very visible sparkles all over my face, so I look like a disco ball in the sunlight!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - pink beige shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product is good but doesn’t work on dry spots. i was trying this out and i had pretty clear skin and i started breaking out because i tried a product that didn’t work with my skin. this product emphasized my dry spot and my pimples. i didn’t not expect it to cover all my pimple because it is a cc cream, but not emphasize them. this product really did work for my skin tone and when my skin was clear, but any imperfections it didn’t work.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best foundation I have been using for the last two plus years. Great coverage and doesn’t make my face look cakey at all. There’s a bit of shine but not too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It would have been better to choose the medium color. My skin looks shiny and hydrated. I really love this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the IT moisturizers with spf Coverage and illumination. I use the one with illumination and without but the one with isn’t as flat looking. Both go on nicely and cover really well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product!  I have really bad melasma (large patches on my forehead and around my mouth).  This product helps cover and make the melasma much less noticeable.  Does it cover it completely, no, but much better than several other expensive creams I've tried.  The illumnation gives my skin a creamy glow.  I've been asked multiple times what makeup I'm using because it looks so great!  Lasts throughout the day, and looks even better with the IT powder too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a sunscreen to even out my skin tone and enhance.  I found the coverage from this product  to be The coverage is more opaque than I anticipated, and more sparkly than I wanted.  I mix it with La roche-posay tinted sunscreen and it's just about perfect but wouldn't buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It's the only one I use. My dermatologist is always asking if I wear Sunscreen everyday. With this I can answer yes. It also smells like lemon pound cake. What's not to love.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - light brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I do like this product as a CC Cream because of the full coverage. I wanted to get something with an SPF that can be used when hiking but still proved some coverage to my hyper pigment. this product did just that and last a while.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Leaves a dewy youthful glow. Currently using a popular brands because I ran out of this, and I miss it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrating and radiant, lets a nice shine remain. There is no glitter, I dont know what some reviewers are talking about. I got this in an Ipsy glam bag and will buy the full size.  I checked the full size ones at Sephora and there is no glitter at all.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect CC cream. I use shade medium over the summer and share light in the winter. Makes your skin feel dewy and hydrated.

reviews.review_title: can not live without this product!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this foundation is IT! crazy coverage and long-lasting smells so good and does the job perfectly highly recommended!!! By far the best foundation our there <3

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my Favorite foundations to use! If you want to have a glowy and dewy look this is the product for you! I’ve used it in extremely Warm climates and cold and I honestly haven’t had any issues with it creating dry patches as other reviews have said...I’m happy with this product and how it makes my skin look. I’d say it provides minimum to medium coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great cc cream.  I have dry skin and I switched to it cosmetics CC cream and I will never go back to regular foundation. This gives me the dewy and glory skin that I have always wanted!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It covered really well but as with lots of other sunscreen containing products, it broke me out. It also oxidized after about 10 mins.

reviews.review_title: go Way lighter in shade range!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am shade Light Medium in everything. NC 25/30 in MAC. And have used shade Light for It cosmetics, oxidized badly.  And it didn’t look good. Recently in store I wanted to try the Illuminating and realized the Glow really came in shade Fair Light. And, It was My actual shade! So please go lighter on your shade range, don’t guess. try them on in-store. Secondly, it’s Glittery! But I was buying a costly tube for my sisters wedding events (daytime), even errands, showers, travel, just everything leading upto the day. and this is that one pretty face thing. The Glow from the glitter is beautiful, though I’m not a glitter fan in anything. When I set it with powder-the glitter and Glow were all gone. It was super upsetting Bc it looked like nothing. So it does the job when you don’t set it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - pink beige shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using IT Cosmetics CC cream for a couple of years, but this was my first experience with the illumination. I was worried it would give me too much sheen or have a shimmery look, but I absolutely love it! I will like stay with the illumination for my next bottle. All of the products of IT that I have tried have been wonderful!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is excellent.  It really does illuminate aging skin, therefore minimizing the look of  fine lines and wrinkles that are so obvious with other full coverage foundations I have used.  The only drawback I have seen is that I tend to use more of this per makeup session than other foundations and the product is going quicker than expected.  Otherwise, I love it and I hope IT never quits manufacturing this particular foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great, but gives you quite a dewy look. After using this and the oil free, I prefer the oil free. Cannot use with moisturizer because it makes you look sweaty. This is a great skin perfecting finish. The product goes a long way so you only need a little

And this product cane not full, after the second day I had to shake the product down to get more out. The sparkles are hard to see in the picture but are more noticeable in person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this Cc cream has SPF so I was happy to try it. However, this did mot look good on my skin at all. It settled quickly into pores and did not create a smooth finish. I asked the Sephora rep if I needed primer and she assured me that I didn’t.

reviews.review_title: Overpriced and does not hide fine lines
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was an extremely overpriced foundation that did not live up to the reviews. This product was no better than other foundations and had less coverage. I had similar results with better coverage with Loreal True Match with a bargain price. Skip this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cc cream looks so beautiful on the skin no primer needed! I was skeptical because there’s so many reviews that say it’s a glitter bomb but it’s actually just a very nice healthy glow. It’s also super hydrating and it applies very nicely with a brush or a sponge. I only use a pump and a half and it looks as if not wearing anything. It could also be build to full coverage depending on preference. I definitely recommend this cc cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so I have super sensitive skin and have been struggling to find a foundation and cover up that works FINALLY FOUND THIS!!!been using it and I absolutely love it!!

reviews.review_title: Finish is great, but the shimmer is distracting

reviews.review_text: So, I needed a CC cream that gave some coverage and that did not sit heavy on the face. The finish is beautiful and looks great upon application but the illumination on my skin is just shimmer particles- which by the end of the day end up on my hands and clothes which is annoying.Still deciding if I am going to keep it, as I do like the coverage and feel on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

Not disappointed.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Disappointing....went on nice, love the shade, but was so short lasting, I looked in the mirror an hour later and it disappeared....it also has small sparkles...not good.

reviews.review_title: Too dark and a little too sparkly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not the palest person ever, but the lightest shade of this offered is still way too dark orange/yellow for me, and the overall shade range of this stuff from lightest to darkest is pretty laughable. It might be okay if you're a medium skin tone with a yellow or orange base, cause that's most of these colors. Coverage is okay, but not spectacular. Longevity isn't great and this gets oily really fast in my t-zone, and I'm not a crazy oily person. Plus, when I tried this in the store, I thought it looked fine, but then in natural daylight or under bright office lights, this stuff is sooo freaking sparkly and looks ridiculous. I kept trying to make this foundation work because I wanted to love it, and I easiest wanted to trick myself into thinking I didn't waste my money on it, but it's just not very good. Maybe try the natural finish or the matte kind, hopefully it's better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really bad skin. Very visible pores and acne breakouts sometimes. This product makes my skin look so nice. Everyone that sees me tells me I’m glowing. I like the dewy look and I like that IT also has a matte version of this product that I can use for special occasions. I highly recommend this product. Definitely a favorite.

reviews.review_title: Weightless coverage you didn't know you needed...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the moist amazing product and I'm so sorry to have only JUST discovered it.  I have VERY dry skin... like people gasp at me when they see me putting Vaseline and aquaphor on my cheeks and forehead.  I also have dark circles under my eyes.  I also want all-day makeup that doesn't sink into and amplify creases OR stain every collar I wear/person I kiss OR feel like I'm wearing a mask.   It's harder for me to find matte-finish products that aren't drying or lacking the emollient-rich feel that I crave. And it's even harder for me to find liquid products that offer the under-eye full coverage that I need, without being super thin and chalky, or super shiny and like clown paint (no blender can stand up to some of those formulas).  Please allow me to introduce the CC  Cream... I promise that I will never look back.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - pink beige shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product but the label sucks.  Half way through the tube the labeling disintegrates and I end up with glitter all over my hands and then it transfers to my face, it also covers everything in my makeup bag. Please fix the packaging, I can justify buying again to be covered in label glitter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, I want to start with I am a very active person. I wore this foundation while white water rafting for two days and it looked glorious all day even after being drenched. I have tried so many foundations and this is by far my favorite. I do recommend using a beauty blender to put it on because I feel like it just makes it look much more natural. A little shimmery but I love that.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the OG CC  cream, so i was excited to try this version because i thought llumination meant dewy finish, which i love for my dry skin. Instead, it's really just like...sparkly? I don't know if it's mica or what, but my face didnt look dewy, just sparkly..ALL over?! If that's what I wanted, I would have just used a liquid highlighter. Also, maybe because of the sparkliness, my skin looked SO SO textured and uneven and even drier. And I also felt it was not full coverage like the original.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like that IT CC creams aren’t heavy and are good for your skin. However, I found this CC to be too “shiny.” It feels like I have glitter on my face. I did my friend’s makeup and saw how glittery it looks. I wish I had bought the regular one. I also think that it needs too much product to build a “full coverage” look. I previously used Nars and UD and had no issues just using primer and one pump.

I was hoping for a nice dewy finish, since this was marketed for dry skin tones, but I notice no difference in formula between this and the original except the glitter. Also, not exactly about the product itself, but the shade range on this leaves something to be desired.

reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to purchase this version over the matte one but I'm so happy I did. It adds a perfect amount of glow to my skin (If you have oily skin the matte version would probably be better). The coverage is great and it lasts alllll day. It also has a really nice scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love that it doesn’t dry out my already dry/combination skin as most foundations do. However, I very much can see the glitter people are talking about (perhaps it’s less with other shades??). It’s super noticeable to me. That being said, the shade itself is a solid match for my skin tone, the formulation is easy to blend and I definitely don’t see too much oxidation throughout the day. Does transfer- I found using a setting spray instead of a primer helps A LOT, and then finishing off the look again with a setting spray. Not sure if I will return just yet.

reviews.review_title: Love, but use it seasonally due to dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product for coverage and does what it says for evening out skin tone.  I have very dry skin however, and learned after using it this last year that it can be very occlusive /heavy on my skin in winter in particular, when skin tends to be even more dry- and my skin couldn't breathe.  I love it in humid environments and summertime. My skin responds well to it and it does not melt or sweat off very easily at all.  But in the winter, if you have drier skin, I recommend mixing it with a basic daily moisturizer, to help thin it out to prevent breakouts and the heaviness of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this originally to wear by itself this summer because a lot of people claimed it made them glow and was pretty good coverage. I would say that it does make me glow and all that but it's not enough coverage that I like. I have ended up wearing it under Vichy foundation that I buy on Amazon as a sort of under glow primer. It is the perfect base for highlighting but isnt the best for coverage. I still think it's worth it if you want to get rid of some redness and uneven skin tone under another foundation or if you have really clear skin and just want to look shimmery. Also I would say that I break out with some foundations but I do not with this one at all.

reviews.review_title: Great, but Fair is too dark.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love (most) everything about this. The finish is definitely SHIMMERY (not glittery like many are saying; glitter is large, loose sparkles). The flecks are small, but if you don’t like that look I could see why you wouldn’t want it all over your face. Personal preference. I love the wear, finish, and shimmer of this product however the fair shade is too dark for me, I wish they made a lighter shade. (I am a Fitzpatrick 1 with blue eyes and I sunburn immediately.) To combat this I use a little less product, rub it in more, and then use a lighter concealer on my chin, under eye, and forehead to help brighten it up. Will probably continue to sue, despite the not quite perfect shade match. Maybe for summer only.

It was so thick it was hard to blend out (you need a brush) which is hard on my sensitive skin. It also does have micro glitters in it which are visible on the face. I tried to half and half this with various moisturizers, which helped the dryness, but for some reason it always looked patchy when doing this. Lastly, the 'fair' is pretty dark. I finished the bottle because I paid for it, but would not recommend.

The best way to use this product is by starting with fingers than using the sponge to even out the product everywhere . Horrible :(

It has a lot of coverage in one application but you can definitely build it up but it does not look cakey and it gives you a radiant glow.   I would highly recommend this product - it is my new favorite and I used to use the Bare Minerals Complexion Rescue and Stila’s illuminating bb cream but this is hands down the best!

I went with the shade fair and I’m not even that pale. It was the only one that didn’t look orange on me. They need to work on that. Especially

reviews.review_title: I've had this product since January 2019.

reviews.review_text: Pros: Good Coverage, High SPF, Nice finish after initial application  Cons: Contains micro glitter, Not longwear at all, Looks cakey after 2-3 hours, Does not work well with dry skin (even though it's marketed for it)

reviews.review_title: What I wish I had known before purchasing...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Here is the real tea y'all! I ordered the It CC Illuminating cream last month. The coverage is medium, it is buildable.  This is a hydrating foundation with a ton of great skin care ingredients. If you have very oily skin then you may not love this foundation. I do love the formula, but I can't wear this one alone. I have to apply with my foundation brush using only a small amount. (pea sized) After it has absorbed into my skin a bit,  I then use a medium coverage non illuminating foundation over the top. I bounce it in with my beauty blender in order to prevent fully mixing the two foundations together.  The reason I use this method is because I find that the sparkles in the CC illuminating are just too sparkly on my skin. It appears as if I used a light dusting of highlighter powder rather than setting powder if I don't cover it with at least a thin layer of my other liquid foundation.  That being said, once I take the time to work with it a bit it truly does look beautiful. The formula aside from the overwhelming  sparkles is amazing. I just  ordered the regular It CC cream and I have a feeling I am going to love it much more than the illuminating type because it is going to save me time, yet still be the same amazing formula with all the skin loving ingredients. Personally I enjoy a more natural light to medium coverage foundation.  I have dry skin so this hydrating formula is amazing for my skin type. Once I recieve the CC cream without the illumination I plan to use it as my everyday foundation exclusively.  If you are someone who enjoys having the visible dewy sparkly look to your skin,  you will love this foundation. I just wanted to give all the details for this one because I wish I had read a review like this before I made my first It foundation purchase.  I am not going to return the illuminating type, I am just going to save it for use when I want to do a full glam look and add my other foundation over top for a full coverage glow from within glam look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this more, as I really like the Matte CC cream and thought I would like the illumination of this formula.  However, I thought I had to use more to get the same coverage and by the end of the day, I don't think it looks as good and fresh as the matte CC cream formula does.  Just my personal experience, but for the price, I won't buy again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - pink beige shade with cool undertones

reviews.review_text: IT is just amazing! Full coverage, no greasy, I love IT!!

reviews.review_title: Oily skin and this foundation are NOT a good combo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this foundation, it has a high SPF in it and the color matched beautifully, and it has all these other wonderful things for your skin in it but...this stuff just falls off my face. And not just falls... it melts off. I’m a mess by the time I get home from work. I tried it with different primers, face lotions, no face lotions... powder... everything. And by lunch time it’s like goopy and super oily around my nose, basically M.I.A. from my chin, and patchy everywhere else. I have oily skin in the summer months and it’s also super dry in the winter. I’m wondering if a more matte formula would wear better on my skin during these warmer seasons (I will test this theory). Regretfully, this one just does not work with me... and I’m really sad about that :(

I am fair with pink and yellow undertones so I'm usually not the lightest shade in a foundation color spectrum, but I was with this line. Definitely go to the store and try this foundation in person rather than buy online.

reviews.review_text: IT CC cream has been my HG for years. I gives just enough coverage with the added benefits of being moistuizing and with SPF 50. This one adds illumination which is a subtle shimmer. Glad they added the color Fair Light since I had to buy one each and mix Fair and Light before to get the right shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My best friend and roommate has used the IT cosmetics CC  cream for a while now, but the regular one and then switched to matte. I loved them both, so I decided to go and buy a bottle for myself. I was going to buy the matte one, but then i came to my mother's house and tried this. I could not believe my eyes. The coverage is amazing, the wear is amazing, it's just truly my holy grail foundation. First off, when I wear it I'm constantly complimented on how glowy I look. I expressed y concern for possibly looking borderline oily, and the people I was with were appalled and said I looked glowy like J-Lo and all begged me to tell them what foundation I was wearing!!! As a girl who has dealt with horrible acne since I was in middle school, I do have a lot of redness and hyperpigmentation. I can apply one thin layer and have such a natural glowy and lightweight look, and then if I'm going to work or somewhere where I want to wear more coverage I'll do half a pump more and apply to my cheeks where the most redness is. I love this foundation, I recommend it to everyone. It lacks all the annoying things that you sometimes have to put up with foundation, like clinging to dry patches which exaggerates mine or wearing off throughout the day. I always thought I'd be a matte type of foundation girl because of how oil my skin would get, but this controls oil so well for me as well. I set with a little bit of the toofaced setting powder and use the butter bronzer from physicians formula which i think is honestly a match made in heaven for this foundation. And then I use nars blush in orgasm. This cc cream changed my life, i use it for every occasion!!

For the price of this cream, the container sucks and need to be improve.  This is not the only CC cream that gives great coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

I found that this did give my face moisture plus a hint of brightening = a dewy-ish finish. That’s definitely a goal I have for my skincare and makeup. I also found this covers well, is easy to blend, and never cakey or oily.  I haven’t found anything negative in this product, and I enjoy using it.

So you'd think since I tried the regular one and loved it and the color matched my skin perfectly, thatthe same named shade would match my skin for this one. Not the case. This one in fair is slightly darker and more yellow toned. Plus I think it oxidizes and makes my face look at least one shade darker. So I'm pretty disappointed that they couldn't match the shades.  Besides this one issue, I love this product. It makes you look glowy and healthy and has great medium coverage. But if you don't set it, it can transfer... so I usually set it with the Laura Mercier glow powder to keep the glow.

reviews.review_title: Great for dry skin and sun protection!

It’s less cakey looking than the original version and blends just fine with other products. As I get a bit older sun protection in a day time foundation is more important than ever to me, this CC  Cream doesn’t irritate my sensitive dry skin and provides me the sweet sweet SPF I crave. I layer it on top of my sunscreen and have no issues whatsoever.

Anyway, I’ve used this for almost a week now, and am ready to go buy a full tube. It is AMAZING! It’s very moisturizing and makes my skin feel and look so young! Worth every penny in my opinion!

The finish looks very dry and cakey on my skin every time, despite using a moisturizer and hydrating primer. It has so much glitter my face looks like I applied highlighter all over and even has a silvery hue, even though it's a tan shade. I will not be finishing the tube and will end up tossing. It might be a good choice for mature or dull looking skin, but I'm 26 and it's awful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

I bought my first tube in Mid December and replaced it today (beginning of May). I wore two small pumps of this six days a week because I spend a ton of time outside. It does streak when you put it on but if you let it ‘settle’ it becomes very matte. Great product for a quick every day face. I do get occasional acne and you do have to use a stronger concealer.  I also noticed it does pill if you use acids (The Ordinarys Lactic, Drunk Elephants Framboise) on before wearing, so I had to move them to my nighttime routine.

reviews.review_text: I have purchased this product over and over again in the last five years or so. I have tried Too Faced Born This Way, Anastasia Stick Foundation, Colorpop's new foundation, Flower Beauty Foundation, Lancome Teint Idol 24 Hour Foundation in the liquid and the stick and this one is the one I keep coming back to. I low the dewyness, the medium/full coverage, the SPF that is not noticeable, the luminosity, and how it plays well with all my other make up. It is easy to travel with (I love that it is not a glass bottle) and here is a tip for everyone who loves this product as much as I do - when you think you are done with the tube cut it in half and use the top as a cap for the bottom - there is about another two weeks worth of product in there!! I use my concealer brush to get it out :)

reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this foundation, based on what I know of it and the excitement for the product by the salesperson. I have dry skin and previous foundations were exacerbating my dry skin. I haven’t had any acne since I was pregnant over 10 years ago. I wore this foundation for 1 day and broke out that night. My face was covered in small pimples. The product has shimmery glitter, that’s right, glitter. While it may help you glow, it probably clogs your pores!  The foundation is also very thick feeling and doesn’t let any of your natural glow shine through. I wanted to give this foundation a good 10 days to see if my skin was just reacting weird to something new. Every night when I washed my face, though, my skin had new pimples.  I decided it definitely was not for me! I took this back and returned it.

reviews.review_text: Yes, you do absolutely HAVE to prime and set with using this foundation. As a new mom, I wanted to cut down on my daily routine (I typically do a full contour). However, with priming and setting required it didn’t live up to its claim. Aside from this, which I honestly could have looked over, I started breaking out extremely bad all over with it’s use. The worst part? It made my newborn breakout with baby acne too! Since I would wear this so sporadically, I was able to notice when she’d have acne flare ups and it was only when I was wearing this foundation. Beware!!

reviews.review_text: The coverage was great as well as the wear and feel of it. BUT OMG THE GLITTER NOT CUTE!!!! Looked like a glitter bomb went off in my face was. A huge waste of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for over a year, and I absolutely love it! This product provides a good cover for your skin, without looking fake and bad. I went to my local Sephora, and was color matched, and this color fits me perfectly! I have had many compliments on my skin while using this, and many people think I have natural perfect skin. My natural skin is actually very sensitive and red, and I never had a break out from it and it gives me the even toned skin I have always dreamed of! It also adds a bit of shine to your face, but the skin doesn't look oily or bad, or like you highlighter all over your face. Hope this helps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love this! Covers more than I thought it was and has a great texture that blends into the skin perfectly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is simply the best “foundation” I have ever used! A little bit goes a long way! I use the IT Heavenly Skin foundation brush, but recently tried it with the foundation brush from the Park Avenue Princess Glow Getters and it still blended and buffed like a dream! Oily girls, the Illumination formula might not be for you. I have combination/dry skin and it works for me, but I also have found that a bit of setting powder (I use Too Faced Peach perfect loose powder or Urban Decays Velvetizer) tones it down from a shine to a lovely, natural “glow”.  I’ve noticed improvement in my skin’s texture as well as less redness and blotchiness and even my pores seem smaller.  In the past, I have tried it all- Born this Way, Lorac, Tarte Amazonian Clay, Bare Minerals, countless drug store brands. My former favorite is Too Faced Peach Perfect Matte.  This blows everything else out of the water! It covers like a full coverage foundation, buffs out for a flawless finish and it SMELLS AMAZING! It’s a clean, slightly sweet scent, but not overpowering. It lasts all day for me, even without a setting spray.  I strongly recommend Your Skin But Better! I just ordered a second, slightly darker shade for summer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones

I love the subtle glitter, but if that isn't you jam, the other IT cosmetics foundation in the gray bottle is the same sans glitter.
