reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this version of your skin but better. I’ve also used the matte, but I tried this for a more dewy look. I think it looks great, and I think the sparkle is subtle and really does add a nice glow. Still everything I love about the other formula—perfect coverage, comfortable application, and all day wear. A great option!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for a couple of years now and find that it goes on quickly and easily.  It has good coverage without having to overdo.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - natural beige shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent makes skin glow!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new fave product for daily face makeup. It feels and looks like more of a foundation to me but a little goes a long way so I’ve experimented with using less for a lighter application. The illumination looks sparkly on your fingers (my method of putting it on) but does not look sparkly on your skin, it really does just give an illuminating glow. I will absolutely buy again. Quick note: it spreads very easily on well prepped skin. Color wise, shades tend to be a little darker than similar shades in other brands.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE. This is absolutely my go-to base product for everyday use. IT Cosmetics has improved this product by leaps and bounds since the last time I gave it a try right after it launched (at first I definitely wasn't a fan). The expanded shade range is great, it gives you way more coverage than you might expect from a CC Cream-type product, the packaging is AMAZING in terms being able to actually use all of the product, and the illumination formula is perfect for dry skin/anyone who likes a nice dewy finish. Also love that it's SPF 50!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was very excited to try this product since I have such dry skin. I would have liked it except for the fact that it leaves little glitter particles all over your skin.. I love looking dewy, but more of a sweaty/luminous dewy. Not glittery. Had to return and try the regular CC cream.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - light brown shade with neutral undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product looks great the first hour. After a few hours the foundation literally melted off my face even using a primer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - pink beige shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The problem is this has a ton of sparkle/glitter in it. It’s shocking. There is no way you would want to slather this all over your face. It’s literally an all over highlighter. Returning it and trying the matte.

reviews.review_title: Great everyday product for busy ladies
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a fan of the matte finish version, but I'm even more in love with this luminous finish version!! As an admitted lazy girl, love that I can just slap this on and nothing else. One step and you have coverage, illumination, moisture and high SPF! Smells really good too. This is marketed as full-coverage but I would say more like a light-medium coverage, but I suppose you could build it if you wanted to. One pump applied with fingers works best IMO.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite foundation ever, my skin glows and looks so healthy! This is my everyday go to foundation. It’s perfect, never clogs my pores, and easy to apply.  When I need a longer lasting foundation I use Senna. But this is bar far my favorite beauty product. A constant in my beauty bag is This illuminating CC, Pop lash extension mascara,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love a foundation that gives a subtle glow! I was using Clinique Even Better Glow foundation but the lightest shade was just way too dark for me. This is perfect! It’s everything I was hoping for and more. I can’t believe this packs an SPF 50 - that is absolutely an amazing bonus. The coverage is medium sheer which is my favorite because I don’t like looking like I have a mask on my face. And what can I say about the smell? It’s heavenly! Normally I don’t like my makeup to have a scent but this smells like you’re in a spa. The product feels great on the skin as well. Very hydrating and lightweight. I’m quickly becoming an IT Cosmetics devotee. Im already in love with secret sauce and their illuminating powder. Can’t wait to try some other stuff!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Had such high hopes that this would finally be The One to work with my dry skin. Alas, no. Doesn't matter what primer, how moisturized my skin is, what setting or misting spray... it still dries and feathers up. It also makes my pores look huge and emphasizes all my lines and texture. Maybe I'll try it again in the summer.

reviews.review_title: I looked like I belonged in twilight
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product not only applies awful, I stepped outside and my entire face was COVERED in specs of glitter. It was ridiculous, I had glitter residue on my face for days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation feels nice on the skin. I personally prefer to apply it with my hands instead of a brush or sponge because I feel that it blends nicer that way. The brush creates too many streaks. The foundation is also very luminous due to the little bits of glitter infused with the foundation. It looks very nice on

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - pink beige shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty but def has sparkle/glitter/shimmer. My initial thought when I put this on was WoW, My skin looked dewy and radiant. After reading some reviews I used my phone’s flashlight to check my skin and oh my... it looked like I had set my face with my highlighter. It’s a shame because the finish is really pretty, hope they can reformulate with less shimmer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a longtime user of the original Your Skin But Better CC cream and i absolutely love it. However, after moving to a colder climate my skin was much dryer in the winter which would leave the original product clinging to my dry spots. When i went to sephora looking for something that was not drying and had a dewy finish an associate recommended this one because of the added skin benefits in this formula. I like the glow and finish of this product but there are two things that I’m not crazy about. One, there are definite sparkles in this product. Not evident in the bottle or even on application, but after squeezing onto the top of my hand before application i notice a patch or glitter there the rest of the day. Two, this product transfers everywhere. Anytime I touch my face during the day I can expect some product to transfer even after powdering in the morning. It gets all over my glasses, hands, and coat. While I like the overall look these things have become rather annoying and I don’t think I would repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Sephora employees keep raving about this product.  I tried it on and it had very obvious, large glitter in it.  When I told the Sephora employee that I could see glitter in it, they told me it didn't.  Um...ok.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice creamy consistency -- not too thick. And gives your skin a dewey glow. I'm allergic to a lot of foundations, but not this one. Feels good on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has broke me out SOOOO much! And the formula is not the best for medium-full coverage, it falls off easily through the day and you have to reapply. Way too hyped and not worth it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product for a year now in multiple shades, and finishes (illumination

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just purchased this after having used a sample I received from a friend.  Love the lightweight coverage, comfortable all year round.  I wear mine over moisturizer and the color correcting is great, really helps with the redness I am prone to.

reviews.review_title: Don't buy if you're planning on going outdoors
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually write reviews, but doing this one so hopefully other people won't make the same mistake I did. Great coverage and color match, but I should've listened to the reviews that said it was glittery. IT IS! It looks great indoors and under artificial lighting, but once the sun hits, looks like I used shimmer powder. DON'T do like I did and listen to the reviewers who said it isn't glittery... Unless that's what you're looking for

reviews.review_title: If only I could buy it for every human being!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely worth trying out this beautiful makeup! Why is this the best foundation? I have searched for the best foundation since high school (I’m now 22) and yes there have been some good ones here and there- but when I discovered this it cosmetics foundation two years ago, I fell in love with the fresh pretty smell, the satin like hydrating feel, how it doesn’t make me break out more than the usual, gives me plenty of coverage, blends very easy/nicely, and even makes my skin have a pretty glow to it!!! People comment how lucky I am to have such beautiful skin without makeup, and little do they know that I have a layer of my favorite foundation on! I wear this everyday, lasts me about half a year per tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with the original IT Cosmetics CC cream and decided to try this one out. I’m not sure if it is how I’m applying it or the formula itself, but it just didn’t look great on me. I prefer the original.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a bit too sparkly for me, and those highlights are bronze, not what I want for pale skin. Used in moderation it looks fairly nice, but the real problem is that a few hours in it looks very dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every single day applying it either with my fingers and a beauty blender for medium coverage during the day or with a foundation brush for more full coverage at night and have been getting lots of compliments on how glowy my skin looks. A little goes a long way so one tube lasts me 4-6 months. My skin is on the dry side especially since I use a retinoid so it can occasionally look a little flaky around the nose/mouth but this is a minor complaint, usually fixed with layering a tiny bit of Aquaphor underneath in those areas. Since this is the Illumination CC those complaining about the “glitter” might prefer to try the regular CC, I find it to be just the right amount of shimmer for a natural looking glow. Most of all I appreciate the high SPF without the look and feel of sunscreen, and the fact that it doesn’t break me out even wearing it all day every day.

reviews.review_title: If you have mature skin, keep looking.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this.  Really.  I tried it so many different ways: with and without primer, with and without moisturizer, a small amount and a bunch, with my fingers, with a brush, with a sponge.  It just didn’t work for me.  I’m 45.   Sadly, I’m starting to get fine lines and some crepey spots, and I was hoping this would be the answer after reading good reviews from other mature people.  But no.  This settles right into all of my fine lines and emphasized them.  It made my sensitive skin itch.  It does match my skin tone very well and it gives good coverage, so it’s got that going for it; so if you have young skin that just needs a little help in covering redness, this might be for you.  I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone over 40.  I’m so disappointed that I spent so much of my hard-earned cash on this, but I’ve quit trying with this one.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best! If you have dry skin, you like to keep makeup every day and want to take care of the sun, is perfect for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the worst CC cream I have ever tried. It made my skin look so bad that I removed it after applying to only half of my face. It emphasizes texture I didn’t know I had. I’ve never returned anything to Sephora, but this ugly mess is going back. I’m 32 and don’t have a lot of texture to my face yet. It made me look old and greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was using the original Cc cream and absolutely loved it, I decided to give this a try because I’ve been addicted to dewy skin. I’m kinda nervous about wearing this out, it’s super glittery. I’m talking highlighter glittery. You can’t see it in regular lighting but if you turn your phone flashlight on it’s straight up Edward Cullen. I’m afraid if I wear this out and the light hits me the right way it’ll look like I poured glitter on my face

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really like the coverage and glow of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wayyyyy to much shimmer. I used this all over my face and every time I hugged or kissed my baby, it lest shimmer on his head or face. I use this only on top of my cheekbones which kind of defeats the purpose of it being a cc cream.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream as a one-step solution for great skin! The coverage is great (without being too cakey). I don't find myself needing primer (or even a moisturizer underneath), and with a spritz of setting spray, coverage lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Went to the store in search a Of a new foundation with a high SPF. I was super skeptical about this product when it was recommended to me in store. I had tried a few IT products and thought they seemed heavy. The makeup artist that recommended it said it would be moisturizing, with a dewy finish. She was right! This is a great product! Even though it’s a CC cream it can be built up to a full coverage look. I find it works best when applied with a foundation brush.  It gives my skin illumination without looking overdone.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the slight highlight effect, excellent coverage. Hard to clean off brushes or blenders

reviews.review_title: LOVED IT,,,, then decided it’s not an everyday we
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this with the first try on, but I ultimately feel like the illumination seems to cling to certain spots ( especially dry ) and draws attention. I bought it knowing it was medium to high coverage but assumed I could do a small amount to get a light coverage to cover imperfections. It definitely is a nice product, but it’s not good for someone who wants to appear like they aren’t wearing face makeup no matter how light you go.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I couldn't find an exact shade match. The shade range is really bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: There is so much glittery fallout in this product that I ended up throwing it out. I don't find that my face looks overly glittery like it covered it in highlight, but I noticed a lot of fallout on my shirt and on my hands from application. Even after washing my hands a fair bit remained. The glitter was actually my only issue with the product, so I probably prefer the non-illuminating IT CC cream if it's the same formula but without the mica.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy Grail of CC creams! Adds a wonderful glow. Don't need too much to be effective. Even my husband noted the tone and glow was a perfect match. Love this stuff!

reviews.review_title: empty bottle but very glowy, natural skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this is a really awesome foundation BUT there is hardly any product in the actual bottle. the sample bottle are super full and look like they will last forever. But the real tube you buy is almost empty!! my tube hardly lasted a month, it was not worth it for the price. i decided to go back to a different product with more coverage as well. I do love how natural looking this product is..

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not only does this have gaudy glitter, but it is way too full coverage for a cc cream. It also is way off on the color. Looking at the picture guide online, I bought the shade light because it seemed right. In person, it is about 3 shades too dark on me. I should have returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fairly light seems to be my best color match but I use the normal CC which was out of stock but I needed to replenish so I thought I would try this. You can actually see the glittery bits, not chunks mind you but, definitely noticeable. I could never do a full face with this, mixed with moisturizer or not. I decided to keep it and see how it works under eyes as I've noticed some discoloration recently. It does pretty well and the glitter is less noticeable.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this. Fantastic coverage but still feels light. On me, it’s only beautiful from a distance. The formula ages me. Even when I wear La Mer moisturizer under it. I have no doubt it’s perfect for Oily skin & young girls though. It’s just not right for an old chick with dry skin

reviews.review_title: cake batter is a smoother better alternative
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i wish i could give this 0. it is not illuminating, it is full of glitter that gets everywhere. it looks great on my skin for about an hour after which time it proceeds to look like I smashed my face into every foundation display in the store and decided for some reason to wear a 10 inch think later of makeup. it's hideous. its both bunches up, flakes off, and separates. something I have never had happen at the same time from any other brand. I've never used this brand before, but this was so absolutely god awful I do not think I will ever try them again. you don't make something this bad and have the rest be ok. I am so happy Sephora has such a great return policy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for years now. It's always been fantastic, and my favorite, but it's always been a smidge too light, or too dark, for my very fair skin (red hair, brown eyes). I usually ended up mixing the fair and light together to get a better match to my skin tone. Then, they came out with Fair Light. I can't believe it, but it is a PERFECT MATCH to my skin color! When I put this on, I can't even see the line where the product ends and the foundation begins. It is seamless and still goes on like a dream. I love it so much because it's now like one with my skin, but gives it a perfected, airbrush look. THANK YOU, IT Cosmetics, for coming out with this perfect shade! I couldn't be happier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are a tween, go for this.  If not, stay away.  WAY too sparkly.  Not illuminator but actual sparkles.  Also, made my face break out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff! Provides really good coverage and a sophisticated glow. I also noticed my makeup goes on smoother and I don’t get as oily throughout the day. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones

reviews.review_text: Great coverage and love the subtle glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is amazing! I love the Shawn that it leaves and it leaves your face feeling extremely silky smooth. I would recommend this to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this louminous CC cream. I have dry skin, especially in the winter months. This has what I would call medium coverage and it is moisturizing. It does not cling to dry skin and has a beautiful finish. It does need to be touched up after about 4 hours though (I do not set w powder though, which could possibly help it’s staying power)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just started using this product and I must say I’m impressed. I actually enjoy the shimmering finish because I feel like it deflects dark spots I have.  Also when I was my face at night my skin is baby soft ❤️

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - pink beige shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_text: So good! Flawless looking skin.

This cream did have “sparkly” look t it, but when applied did not look like glitter and it had a really nice shimmer when applied. I wore it out for a night and it stayed put, did not show all the dry spots on my face and wore well throughout the night. It definitely has good coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the regular Your Skin But Better for years now but had begun to think the finish was too dull.  This is my new go to product!  I love the glow I end up with.  It’s exactly what I was looking for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I did not find this foundation to do anything special. It did not go on good, did not cover. Looks more like a BB cream that it too glittery. Pass, pass, pass!!
