reviews.review_text: Terrible product all around. Most of the shades are too dark. The product is heavy and left glitter all over my fingers when applying. It was hard to remove, took wipes, facial soap, and scrubbing.

reviews.review_title: a MUST for ppl with dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this CC cream for about a year and and half now. It’s works amazingly well on my dry skin. It leaves a beautiful glow and literally feels like you have nothing on. The pump on this tube is also amazing!! You literally get every last drop of product out of it. So worth with especially if you have dry skin!

reviews.review_title: be careful what concealer you use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great beautiful product, but do not use with shape tape concealer! IT WILL BE CAKEY UNDER THE EYE, the nars pot concealer works great, but be aware and bounce into skin really well!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - pink beige shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: • easily blends, covers up spots & protects skin, perfect daily use product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t like the feel of foundation; it just feels thick.  I’ve tried many tinted moisturizers. THIS CC is a game changer for me.  Finishes my skin with more even tone and gives just enough of the illumination but not too much.  LOVE

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - ivory pink shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While shopping for moisturizer, I was approached by a worker who, after speaking at length about skin care, told me that all she was wearing was CC cream. I decided that I was going to splurge and buy it even though I had not researched it beforehand. I like it. I initially put it all over my face like a foundation. But it looked really oily. I decided to try it just on one side of my face to see if there was a difference. I could definitely see the difference but it still set in my pores. Reading the label a little more thoroughly, this product is first made to be a tinted sunblock but the bottle does mention instructions if you prefer to use it as your main foundation. As mentioned, it settled into my pores but all in all, it is not a terrible product and if you want to have some light coverage while hanging outside, this would definitely work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect blendable coverage for me. Can build coverage or keep it light. Nice and dewy! I have sensitive skin and this doesn’t irritate or clog my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product gave me the color, coverage, and illumination/moisture I wanted, and it lasted all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to CC cream, sunscreen and tinted moisturizer. I never leave home without it and have multiple shades for year-round complexion perfection!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s doesn’t give good coverage and feels cracky on your skin. Definitely do not recommend. I had to waste my money on this product as I didn’t use it after using it for a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It didn’t match my skin after using the shade finder there were flex of glitter in the products. And made my skin look awful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage of this was really good. However, there’s so much sparkle in this product! I have huge pores and textured skin and the sparkle in this really enhanced it. After I used powder it was alright.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 55 and have been blessed with good skin but it is starting to show signs of aging. For me most recommended foundations for aging skin to be too heavy in coverage. This coverage is so sheer yet is covers well! It is also buildable if you want more coverage. You can feel the hydration all day! The glow is subtle and perfect, not glittery at all. A winner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted this cc cream to work for me, especially with the lofty promise of the illumination factor. Unfortunately It just doesn’t hit the mark. It is very drying and emphasizes my pores. I’ve tried layering a variety of oils/creams/moisturizers underneath, which I shouldn’t have to do with a CC cream. I just can’t seem to keep this from making my skin texture problems more noticeable.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love how it looks on my skin, the dewy finish is fantastic and I get so many compliments on how nice it looks. That being said I do tend to end up with a brand new breakout the day after using this product without fail. If you don’t have super sensitive skin I do recommend this product!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - pink beige shade with cool undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much. I’ve been looking for a foundation that stays on and doesn’t dry my skin out and I have finally found it. My skin actually looks glowy and dewy throughout the day. I will definitely be repurchasing this when I run out.

reviews.review_title: I love the SPF and coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve repurchased this twice now.  I tried it for the SPF (I’m very fair) and love it for the coverage.  It goes on thick... a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: amazing product for the butterfly in you
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I normally have dry dull skin due to my lupus. I've been using this brand for three its now because it covers up my butterfly rash. It's full coverage. I was excited to use this illumination foundation as soon as it hit the market. I am in love with this one. It makes my skin look like it is full of life again. It gives me a dewy skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: IT has a wonderful new product! I love the regular formula and just had to give this one a try. I was most certainly not disappointed! This tinted moisturizer goes on beautifully, and the depth of coverage is strictly up to you. This new illuminated version produces a lovely healthy and natural looking glow. This is now by new go-to for foundation, I would definitely recommend and will definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Currently my favorite foundation. Color stays on all day, the touch of sparkle brings a highlight to my skin and evens out my different skin tones. Covers whatever I want depending on how much I apply. It blends so easily. Love this product. Use a little or a lot, up to you each day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely love the coverage and the way I shimmer. This is light and doesn’t feel like heavy makeup and it’s really great with my skin tone. It’s long lasting and seems like it’ll last a month even with daily use.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing full coverage!!! It give you a natural bright face. I would recommend to go easy on highlight though. I have vitiligo, rosacea and sun damage. It covers all!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try something new with a bit more coverage after my YSL Touche Eclat Tinted Moisturizer ran out and I had such high hopes for this CC Cream. The coverage is amazing and I love the SPF 50 but sadly it's way too glittery even with only using a small amount! And I do mean glittery and not dewey - I've bought tons of dewey finish products over the years and this CC cream looks like I accidentally got glitter eyeshadow all over my face. If that's your thing, cool. But if you're like me and would be wearing this to a corporate job, it's not ideal. Topping it with powder also does not soften the glitteriness. I'll be trying the original version instead.

reviews.review_title: Not better than the original for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is good but the original IT Cosmetics CC  is better for me and will be my next purchase

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage, beautiful color. I have tried similar high end products, but this one is the best!  It provides all day coverage with a clean shimmer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the regular version of this, but this one is sparkly to the point where it makes my face look oily and shiny

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has an amazing smell. It has a very pretty finish that doesn’t make the skill look too dewy. It is not the best for oily skin but I do not mind it actually. It does coagulate in my nose crevice by the end of the day. I do not really mind.  I just pat it back in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really love the radiant but natural glow, as well as the excellent coverage this product delivers. Plus, there's no milky opaqueness I have found in similar foundation products. I totally agree with all the five-star reviews! Also, since I live in a very sunny climate, I LOVE the SPF 50  feature.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes my skin glow and has a great amount of coverage.  Will definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only give 4 stars because I wish was fuller coverage.   I have acne prone skin, combo and with melasma. Sucks. So I look for products that doesn’t make me break out more - and this was fabulous, zero break outs-  Lasted almost one full year for me but I don’t wear it every day - 4-5 days a week at most- and it blends well with sponge. If dabbed with fingers covers a Little better my dark spots but still not great. My skin is light , has a lot of red acne scars and light brown melasma. It will cover well the acne scars but not the melasma.  The texture is actually really nice and it wears light. Looks natural and  young, I really like that it almost seams like not seeing make up. It has 50 FPS which is great. I think if I have not dark spots, this product will be a 5 starts for me.  I am gonna try the “matte finishing” new product of the brand to see if it offers a better coverage, if not I will definitely stick with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: and enhance the look of skin brightness without glitter or shimmer ...I'm not sure how IT Cosmetics can claim this, unless I've been mislead my entire life as to what glitter actually is.... BECAUSE MY FACE IS COVERED IN GLITTER! Absolutely, undoubtedly sparkling. It's not a little glitter either! It is A LOT of glitter. I don't look like I have naturally glowing skin, I look insane....it's all over my lips, eyelids, nostrils.....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the regular formula for years and adding a highlighter.  So I gave this a shot and have not been disappointed.  I use this everyday now.  I have dry skin and I’m not getting younger, so I use my serums, a moisturizer, and top it with this and a light setting powder.  I don’t find it glittery at all.  I think it looks very natural and glowing.  It can settle into fine lines, but it’s a CC cream...they do that.  A sheer setting powder helps that from happening.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never bought a foundation more than once until I got this. Also I hate wearing foundation despite my acne-scarred skin. It covers well even using a small amount (I've had one tube for about a year..) and is definitely buildable without feeling heavy.  It finishes smooth and I always get complimented on my glow! Love that it has SPF and is cruelty free too

reviews.review_title: Works well with my skin type
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I will caveat this review by saying that I haven't tried a large number of high-end foundations. (God, that would be expensive!) I have found that this works very well for me with a few modifications.  - I am somewhere between fair and light, so I have two and blend them. - The formula is very much full coverage, and can set before it is fully spread. Depending on the season I will cut it about 50 / 50 with a moisturizing primer or a moisturizing sunscreen. I find that with this modification is spreads nicely and easily and gives me the desired medium level of coverage.  With these adjustments, this is a really nice foundation that lasts all day and doesn't crease or accentuate my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product.   Have a drawer full of foundations that can’t compete with one.   Living in FL part time I never have to use extra sunscreen with this product.  It stays on all day and the Light and medium colors blend well with my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best foundation I have ever used, I have aging, combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC Cream! I Mix the Illumination Cream in Fair with the regular CC Cream in Light (I'm in between shades) and my skin looks beautiful.  The Illumination cream leaves a very slight sparkle that is really pretty.  This cream has very good coverage without being heavy.  If you need a little more coverage I sometimes use the It Cosmetics Under Eye Corrector under my eyes.

reviews.review_title: Great CC cream for dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with dry skin, I really do love this product. I am constantly reaching for this product as a daily base. I do not prefer full coverage bases, so this is a great product if you want some coverage but not a full face of foundation. I did notice that there are small specks of micro-glitter in this CC cream. I really don't mind that, so if you are extremely anti-glitter, I'd suggest trying the regular CC cream from this brand. It lasts a good amount of the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best liquid foundation. I mix this with the non-illumination to tone down the glow factor. Full coverage, doesn't cause me to breakout and lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorites!!! Medium coverage, and SUPER hydrating!! This is a VERY luminous foundation, but after you apply all other products, it looks fantastic! Its great to mix with other foundations as well. Definitely recommend... especially for dry skin!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this thinking it would work well for my dry skin. The lightest shade is too dark. When I applied it the stuff was cakey, couldn't cover  my breakout and looked like I put liquid highlighter on my face.

reviews.review_title: Pixie dust with a splash of CC cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: DO NOT BUY THIS!! I was so excited to try this I didn't read the reviews but I should have. This stuff has so much glitter in it, yes glitter, that it looks like I got into a fight in a craft store. I look shiny from a distance but up close you can see the pieces covering my skin. For $38, I will be returning this. Seriously whoever had the idea for this should be demoted to the mail room. I hope it's clear in the pictures I uploaded. NO MORE GLITTER IN FACE MAKEUP!!!!!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was not a fan gave a funky finish on my dry skin and over time completely dried it out. I have acne and did not cover well. My guess is that it will only completely cover your acne and redness is if you use a lot of product. Not a huge fan

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried the fair in store and it was really pale, and I love how full coverage it was on my hand,but they didn’t hv the shade light, so I purchased online instead.  After almost a week I was so excited to try them on when I finally got it, but it just disappointing me so badly I was really thinking abt returning it and I’ve never returned anything. Not even the huda liquid lip set which is absolutely awful!!!!!!  The color light was just off on my skin. It looks like I’ve rubbed dirt all over my face. It’s dull even it clams to be illuminating. But I have to say I do have a lot of shimmer on the back of my hand where I dispense the foundation at the first place. It just doesn’t show on your face tho.   You really need to find your absolute shade before u purchase it. Wear them for few days then decide you buy them or not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have some middle age hormonal acne to contend with, after several years of clear skin, so I was looking for a light makeup for sensitive skin. I use a medium weight brush since I don't want heavy coverage. It goes on really easily and smoothly. I can build it in any areas that are discolored. The glitter issue - in normal ight, I just get a really nice highlight. In direct sunlight, I can see some flecks of glitter, but not enough to deter me. My only issue is the luminosity doesn't do much to hide the acne, so I use a little matte powder in those areas. I like that I don't need a highlight/glow product when I use this - just a light coat, mascara, and lips and I'm good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don't treat this product like you do with your other foundations! I use to prime and moisturize my skin before applying this product with a beauty blender (as I do with my other foundations). However, this product has 50  sunscreen so using a primer or moisturizer underneath it causes it to break down the CC cream. Now, I apply it with my fingers as I would a moisturizer to my bare skin. Changing how I applied it completely changed my first impression of it. It no longer breaks up around my chin and nose and it doesn't cling to any dry patches within hours as it did when I was using a primer.  This isn't the most long-wearing product, butI find that it fades nicely throughout the day. After a full day of wear, my face looks more dull, but still nice.  3 stars because I have to set my entire face with a powder and touch up throughout the day because of how dewy it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love this product it gives me coverage, spf 50 and perfect moisture. I also have a little glow!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I love the finish of it and it sits so pretty on my skin but you can definitely see the glitter if someone is looking too long

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Adorei! It’s perfect! It was indicated by @carolinagabrova!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this CC cream!! I purchased this CC cream after going to a make up application sesion at Sephora and an employee used this on my skin. I was looking for a light coverage foundation that I wouldn't sweat through for a wedding. She recommended this based on my skin, I have combo/dry skin and this sit really well. It's not as light coverage as I thought it would be considering its a cc cream but its really great. It has 50 spf so I didn't have to use any with my moisturizer. If you do not like a glowy look, this is not for you. It does have a glow-y sparkly look to it, but on your face it's not really noticeable. A little goes a long way. Definitely would recommend and will be repurchasing once it's done.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great formula - covers redness really well, smooths into skin, looks natural... but 3 stars bc the glitter is just too much - not illuminating, tacky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally! a cc product with good SPF that does not break me out.  I had tried them all. The only one I could use was Dr. Jart, but this IT product is more moisturizing and the illumination gives a great finish.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m finishing my second tube. Everything about this CC Cream is amazing. The color match, the coverage, the pump. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I decided to buy this CC cream after having had it used as a light weight foundation for me while I was working a long day on a hot set. I was a little worried that it wouldn’t live up to my first impression, but decided to give it a go and COULD NOT BE HAPPIER. The coverage is light but buildable, it’s super dewy, and gives an all around natural look. It holds up shockingly well to sweat/heat. My only complaint is that, being extraordinarily fair skinned, even the lightest shade is SLIGHTLY too dark. I would still recommend this to my fellow super fair skinned ladies/gents. All around a great product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's good for everyday use but this formula doesn't last long on me. I prefer the one that's not illuminating. But it's still a good product. Light and doesn't make me itch.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great lightweight coverage for summer days

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Full coverage, smooth and even skin tone cream foundation. It's great for dry skin! However, it can look a little oily throughout the day even though it stays on better than any other foundation I've tried.

reviews.review_title: Solid choice for high SPF and med or heavy cover
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this after laser treatments for age spots, when my dermatologist cautioned me to upgrade my SPF. Once I got used to using a smaller amount (Literally, a pea-sized amount does my whole face), I have come to love this. I can get heavier coverage if I use a brush, medium if i use my fingers. It has just enough reflective quality that I could easily get away with no undereye concealer. I would take away half a star because the shimmer quality is a tad heavier than I would like, but then I'd probably have to use concealer again! Instead, I am going to purchase the version without it so I can customize as needed.  This is a solid choice for anyone who needs a high SPF and likes variability of coverage. If you are shy about the illumination properties, try their regular version. You can always add some luminizer drops if you want.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wear foundation every single day but I want to stop and use beneficial products for the skin. So I bought this product. I find it best applies with your fingers, I tried it with a beauty blender and it made it look cakey. You don’t need to apply a lot of product a little goes along way. It has good coverage and it feels light weight. The only thing I didn’t like so much is that it has tiny specs of glitter. I have textured skin So it emphasizes it a bit more because of the glitter. I set it with powder to add more coverage and I am good to go for the entire work day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Calling all Twilight lovers! If you want to look like you stepped out of a cheesy vampire movie then this is the product for you. Oh boy, will you shine and sparkle like a freaking disco ball being illuminated by all of the glitter in the entire world. BUT THATS NOT ALL!! Ever wonder what it feels like to be an dry, overdone Thanksgiving turkey? Of course you have! Look no further..   Seriously, don’t buy this unless you’re Edward Cullen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mehhhh this was just okay. I prefer the original CC Cream still. This has a bit of glitter in it which highlighted my milia and uneven bits on my face  and it slid off my face a good bit throughout the day. Not over the moon about this one for my particular skin type. However, if you have relatively blemish free & even skin this would probably be beautiful on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so natural looking and has a wonderful coverage.  I have acne and acne scarring and it covers them so nicely without the need of color corrector or concealer.  It’s also very buildable. I definitely recommend this to people who like natural, non-cakey foundations but still want a good coverage. Plus! It’s lightweight and great for dry or dry combination skin! (smells great too)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Has good coverage but I prefer the original CC cream. This one almost looks too glittery instead of illuminating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: True to its promise! Gave me a glowing look. Blends easily, never cakes and long lasting wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage! I have sun spots and discoloration on my cheek but I have not used concealer after I started using the IT Cosmetics CC Illumination Cream.  I have combination skin but it does not get too oily or too dry for all day. I like the fact that it does not have fragrance. I only wish that they will have more color variation with pink undertone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It´s a very nice CC cream...i don´t find it ILUMINATING at all, but it´s a good product. I have dry skin, and this product helps a lot hydrating my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great makeup! Smells great! Looks amazing! Stains my Real Techniques blending sponge but I don’t mind. Lasts long with a good setting powder, I like to use the Hoola Airspun powder.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite foundation! Super light wear with full coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product stays on all day and has good coverage without looking heavy. You need very little product or it will look heavy on your face. It also is moisturizing which is nice on my super dry skin. And I love the 50spf

reviews.review_title: Not so good for brown uneven skin color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the fact that it has SPF 50 but it makes my uneven area look very ashy. Would like if they had more colors

reviews.review_title: Only buy if you're ok with glitter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Do not buy this CC cream unless you like having glitter on your face. This left noticeable glitter particles on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Y’all, I really wanted to love this foundation but boy howdy did it not work for me.  I’m pretty fair, but the fair shade wasn’t a good match for me — it looked really yellow almost and just wasn’t complimentary for my skin tone at all. Definitely was too dark, and I had to blend it down my neck every time so I didn’t look like I was wearing a mask. Plus, my fiancé pointed out that every time I wore this, it would ball up on my face and look unnatural, and he never notices makeup stuff like that. Also, I love dewy, glowy foundations but the radiance for this one almost seemed glittery to me? Maybe it’s just me? All in all, kind of a bummer because I REALLY wanted to love this product, but just not for me.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - light brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! Great coverage! Awesome looks. Very natural! One of my top favorites!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I thought it might be too sparkly for all over my face but it does a great job of giving that dewy glowy look versus a disco ball look. Great coverage and has SPF! Perfect for summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the concept with the glowing skin, spf, primer etc But it made me look like the Tin Man. I felt like people need sunglasses to look at me. And it remains tacky too. I make it work by mixing it with the regular IT CC cream and putting powder over it. I won’t repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Looove this and the original formula. I find myself always going back to this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can look okay at first if you set it with powder really good. But after a few hours it starts getting really patchy. It also looks like you set your face with a glitter highlight. If you have oily skin I’d stay far away and even really dry skin since it patches and clings to dry patches. I would get the regular it cosmetics cc cream that’s my holy grail.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation with all the good benefits for your skin! I have oily acne-prone skin. Before I used to feel guilty wearing a bunch of makeup because my skin would break out. Now I don't feel so bad wearing full coverage foundation because of this product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Perfect everyday cream. Leave my skin looking healthy, vibrant and dewy. Will certainly repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The foundation does not settle into your skin. Once you step in the sun, this just looks ridiculous on glitter bomb. Also in the natural light, it reflect all imperfections and makes your skin look worse. It took three washes to get all the glitter off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good product if you like light coverage, or need to correct little imperfections on your face. The shade range needs some work. I would definitely set this product, it wears off a little during the day. It does make your skin look nice, but I live in an extremely hot climate and wish it wore better through the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is by the far the BEST out there.  I’ve had expensive and lower cost ones but I bought the mini of this one and cannot be without it.  It layers for coverage and lighter for during the day.  It looks so natural on your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!  I have a history of melanoma so I love that this has SPF but doesn't feel greasy or break me out.  Great coverage too.  On the fence about whether I like this one (illumination) or the regular one better.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was a life changing purchase. I’m vain and just went through a battle with hormonal acne and dark spots.    know the internet makes it easy to exaggerate but this really is life changing.   I used to color correct with both purple and yellow, conceal, then foundation, then conceal and set. It’s also incredibly hydrating and is a sunscreen.   Since it’s real hard to do a full foundation face and keep the rest of your face light eliminating all those steps to look like I had smooth skin has eliminated a ton of other products. I now use the cc cream, eyeliner & brows, mascara, blush, and highlight.   Thanks to this product I’m back to being low maintenance! I cannot sing its praises enough.

reviews.review_title: One of the better foundations but..
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the better foundations I’ve tried but havent found a holy grail foundation yet- really want to give it 5 stars, but I feel like for my skin it’s just a little too oily- unless you set it or will rub off on your hands or whatever else. Love the coverage- would say it’s a medium coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Must have item! I have used tinted moisturizer for years for my everyday. This is just like those but better. Not heavy, wonderful coverage and looks amazing!  I get compliments on my skin now all the time with this product. Can’t live without

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The pump makes it easier to control the amount you want to apply. The luminosity is subtle and makes the skin look flawless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love IT products. My new fave. Color is a tad to dark but will be perfect after I get my summer tan on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this brand, but the color was a bit too dark.  Returning the product with out fuss or questions is another great point for Sephora.  Thank you as always!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is amazing. I purchase it to have full coverage, yet, not feeling weighed down with make up. It withstood Miami weather and jet skiing.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's just OK nothing special. It does make my skin super oily during the day.

reviews.review_title: My go to for lite coverage, a little goes a long w
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product, all you need in one tube, awesome coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a tinted moisturizer with a bit of color, which apparently does not exist. Instead, the saleslady at Sephora guided me to this, and OMG, it is what I wanted and so much more!!!!! It is light as a feather and leaves my skin looking like itself, but only better!!!! Totally addicted to it now!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I expected it to give a nice glow but this is super glittery. It also gives horrible flashbacks. The coverage is not that full. It’s more like a medium coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried really hard to like this. It has pretty good coverage considering its not a foundation but it is so heavy/thick. It feels like a mask when you are wearing it and does not sink in to your skin. The color match was decent. The worst thing is that this made me break out in tiny little bumps all over my face. Will be returning asap.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I personally like using this product, it was suggested to me by a Sephora employee. It does a great job to cover my redness, I have pretty dry skin, and you can build up the coverage. And if you’re not much of a fan of shimmers, I wouldn’t recommend it because it definitely reminds me of the sun reflecting on Edward’s sparkling skin from Twilight. But I mean, I try to neutralize it a bit by using my setting powder.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Rich - golden brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible product. It has sparkles in it and goes on uneven and patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s straight up GLITTER. I removed this with a balm cleanser and followed up with a cotton pad. The cotton pad didn’t have any color residue but instead had specks of glitter on it. From afar, this looks fine. But you look at me at a talking distance, I look like a freaking disco ball.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has visible glitter in it. The glitter gets everywhere. Prefer the original cc cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a HUGE fan of IT Cosmetics CC cream, this particular version makes you sparkle like Edward Cullen. I was torn between 3 and 4 stars. Coverage is good and feels like a dream but every time I catch my reflection it is SHINY.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - light brown shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is sometimes hard for me to find CC Creams or any foundation product that doesn't have many shade variations but  tan kind of matches my skin. The medium-tan is too light so I mix it with a little of my concealer to lighten it a little bit. It does have some sort of sparkle/glitter effect so that took a little time getting used to but otherwise the product is decent. I give it four stars for the coverage - one pump is a good medium coverage and two pumps gives full coverage. I have dark acne scars and it does a good job of covering them. The other thing is it doesn't last all day, it starts to fade by 2/3pm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a do-it-all product to streamline my morning routine. It had to 1) be a full coverage foundation, 2) be cream based, 3) not messy to apply 4) include a high spf. This product does it all. Goes on like second skin and applies best with a brush, I find. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Since Sephora continues to stop carrying my favorite products, I have to find replacements. Luckily, this one is cheaper than my go-to CC cream. I like the illumination, as it hides hyper pigmentation and adds a dewy glow. I think this product works best for those who don't like a heavy application. I use a tiny amount after my skincare routine, and it hides imperfections without appearing heavy.

reviews.review_title: Now we can all be Vampires!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the regular CC cream from IT Cosmetics, so I decided to try this one out after an associate recommended it.  Did you ever read/see the Twilight series about the vampires who shine like diamonds in sunlight?  Well, this will guarantee you a starring role should they make an6 more sequels. To be fair, the coverage is great and will cover redness and even skin tone, and it would be perfect for say Carnivale or clubbing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oxidizes like crazy!! Also, looks like you put highlighter all over. I thought it meant “illumination” like a dewy finish, but omg no.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is amazing! It provides me just enough coverage to give me a glow and I’m so happy I made this purchase. It also helps to have the spf in it so I’m not spending extra on a sunscreen. This formula is light on the face and feels amazing on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the regular version of this CC cream, it's the same thing without the glitter. Glitter accentuates pores and texture, and just looks horrible all over the face. It just looked so bad. I recommend the regular version of this - it's the same coverage and it's very dewy and radiant, not matte at all.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually use mineral makeup, but needed something liquid while I'm on Accutane. This was the only cc/bb/tinted moisturizer/liquid foundation that I liked. It completely covers redness, lasts all day, and doesn't transfer. It also isn't as drying on my skin as others. I do still use a heavy moisturizer underneath.  It isn't sparkly or shiny on me, though it does take a few minutes to settle after applying (like sunscreen). I get lots of compliments on my glowy skin.  The main negative is the shade range. They are ALL yellow-toned, though this line is much better than the original in that respect. It would be great if they introduced more shades and tones.

reviews.review_title: Saved me from looking like a crusty potato
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've worked my way through various makeup lines to find the right foundation for my skin. My skin is dry and I'm very picky about what I use. This CC cream is the first product I've used that looks natural, gives me the coverage I need, and doesn't dry out my skin. Love it!

reviews.review_title: emphasizes lines and pores, dry patches
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I give it 2 Stars just for the SPF. As a foundation, did not work for me. Noticeable shimmer and settles into and emphasizes fine lines and pores, gets worse throughout the day. It's supposed to be hydrating but my skin has never been drier and crepier looking.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how moisturizing this is, and the illumination gives you a nice glowy dewy look with at least medium coverage.

reviews.review_title: Just what I was looking for!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been on the hunt for the perfect B.B. or cc cream with a tint and I think this is it! I have never worn foundation and hate the heavy feel of it, but I needed something with more coverage than a moisturizer that would leave my skin with a dewy glow. This was recommended by two of the ladies at Sephora, I’m so grateful that they did! I love the way this looks and feels (almost like I don’t have anything on). I apply it with my fingers over my usual moisturizer because my skin is pretty dry. At the store they applied it on me with a sponge which I think looked even better but I prefer a very easy routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My mom's in her 50's and she was looking for a foundation that didn't emphasize her wrinkles. Got a sample in mail first and couldn't believe the coverage this cc cream had and the beautiful natural glow it gave her complexion.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the fairest shade, and it's still a little dark. It's also more of a medium coverage than full coverage as I can see my age spot through it. It wears off throughout the day even if I set with spray or powder. It's also definitely glittery.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!! Gives my skin a creamy glow! I'm 46 and starting to age a bit, but this CC Cream disguises my lines and age spots. Will buy this again!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love this formula, even better than the original. my skin looks so smooth and radiant, and the coverage is great too. my favorite way to apply is with an artis-style brush.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent foundation; I have tried them all.  This one hides redness and has a nice glow to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely amazing. I had been mixing a highlighter in with my old foundation to get this effect but it was never as good as this. Great coverage and it just makes your skin glow!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product blends super nice. And gives a natural finish to the face.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has tons of tiny sparkles/glitters that will make you look REAL bling. My skin tends to get shiny throughout the day so this is not a look that I prefer. My t-zone, especially the forehead, does get pretty shiny even when I set this with a powder. However this does give a very nice coverage but still leaving my skin looking like skin. I like to apply with a flat brush and tap it into the skin with a damp sponge for light to medium natural finish. It also leaves the skin smooth to touch after it sets. The medium shade is a bit too dark for me but can definitely work for summer time.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Great coverage with a nice glow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s just ok. Not a lot of coverage and not a fan of the illumination.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's as good as any $60 face makeup.  Looks/feels natura

reviews.review_title: I may be old, but I still want to look good!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am 70 years old, and I have had chemo therapy twice for breast cancer, both my age and chemo has resulted in blotchy and dry skin.  I have tried many deluxe make up which often settled in my well earned creases.  I have rosacea (mild) and the other make up didn’t cover the red splotches. So, WTH, I saw the creator of It cosmetics on TV and thought what I have to loose, this product was half the cost of the high end products I have tried.  So after applying a moisurizer , which I have always done, then applied this product.  Results:  I was very pleased with how it covered my many issues, without looking like like a mask of caking makeup.  The product didn’t settle in my creases and my pores looked less noticeable.  What I liked was that it did have a very slight “illumination” which I think helped to disguise my imperfections. The reason I didn’t give it 5 stars, after about 10 hours, I needed to re apply.  Maybe I am expecting too much from a product, but Hay I am an active senior and I still have long days.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - golden beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I freaking LOVE this! I never write reviews but this is seriously beautiful! It’s easy to just apply and go! I don’t need to set it or even use a brush or sponge. It makes my skin feel great and evens out my skin tone and makes me look so dewy. It’s perfect! The only reason it isn’t 5 stars is because of the poor shade range. Almost didn’t buy this because of a YouTube review but so glad I tried for myself! This is now a major staple for me!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first IT product I tried. I have dry   maturing skin and bought this for those days I'm running errands and don't feel like doing a full foundation routine. To my surprise I really love it. I apply it with Sephora's airbrush precision foundation brush and give it a final once over with a beauty blender. Its definitely illuminating. I use a light amount  of Laura Mercier's translucent power on the areas I want less illumination. I can get out of the house quickly since it takrs less effort than foundation to apply and blend. I gave it 4 stars because I thought the coverage would be more full, but its working great for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a big fan of using an illuminating primer such as the Becca backlight priming filter with the original IT Cosmetics CC cream so I decided to give this a try to reduce my makeup application steps. The application/coverage is about the same as the original. When you go in the sunlight the small shimmers are very visible all over. My husband, who never comments on my makeup, even mentioned that it was very noticeable. Also, if you touch your face the glitter transfers. Would not recommend this product but would highly recommend the original cc cream.

reviews.review_title: best foundation for my butterfly rash
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best foundation. I’m 38 yr old and I suffer from the butterfly rash. (Lupus) this is the only foundation I’ve found that covered up the redness and soften my lines. It doesn’t just what it’s formulated to do!!  I’ve tried Other brands and they didn’t seem to cut it or they made my skin worst.

reviews.review_title: Product rolls or peaks on skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love IT CC cream.  The Illumination CC cream looks even better on HOWEVER I’ve been having a problem with it rolling or peeling up on my skin.  Not sure what to do about it.  I don’t have this problem w other IT products using same dash care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First let me start out by saying I have acne prone, combination skin and this product does not break me out! The coverage is amazing even over blemishes. The first time I wore it I wore it alone and definitely felt like my face was just a little too dewy and I looked oily. After that, I started mixing it with my Fenty foundation and I'm in LOVE with the combination.  I found the best way to apply this is with a stippling brush and then finish the application with a beauty blender.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product but unfortunately caused me to break out. I don’t have sensitive skin and have used other CC creams without issue but this caused several pimples- gave it a try twice and both times ended with pimples. It may be due to all of the various ingredients and oils in the products. Such a shame, it did look lovely and dewy on the skin though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: while trying to find a really good CC cream I picked up a sample of this IT Illuminating CC and the Erborain CC to try at Sephora. I was very underwhelmed with this IT CC as I have read many good reviews.  Even after applying it to my face I noticed it not sitting very well on my nose or forehead. Checking the mirror throughout the day I noticed the product gathering around my nose. The amount of glitter in this formula is also a little much for me - I rather use a highlighter in places I want that extra sparkle.  On another note - I loved the Erborian CC! It sat so flawlessly on my skin and stayed that way all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have a love/hate relationship with this product. I love the smell and the coverage. It’s not a thick heavy foundation. I have acne scars and this doesn’t cover them completely but it completely takes away the redness and makes my skin look even and natural which I love. A little product goes a long way and it’s pretty hydrating.   Then I hate how it makes my skin kinda feel sticky all day and it has this weird sparkly shiny glow or “illumination” and I hate it. It makes me look older under the eyes and give a yellow cast to my skin. I will be trying a lighter shade to see if that helps but at this time I’m split right down the middle on this one.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has really nice coverage and looks great on mature skin and doesn’t settle in any lines.  I did get that nice glow indoors That others have mentioned. However when I go outside all I can see is glitter and sparkle.  If you were at when there’s an overcast or if where you live doesn’t get a lot of sun it’ll be fine. But if you live in Texas like I do you where there is sunshine all the time you should check it outside in the sun before you buy it.  Love the original though and the SPF 50 is amazing

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It looks pretty good when you first put it on but throughout the day I noticed that it started to cling onto dry patches. The coverage is pretty good just be cautious if you have some patches.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - ivory shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product for summer days. Perfect for when I want coverage but don't want a heavy foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this CC! Amazing to correct any discoloration while giving a good med-full coverage and hydration into the skin. Anti-aging with a great SPF! I’m combination skin and do find that I have to use a primer and a setting powder to make it last all day but others don’t seem to have that problem with it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really good coverage. My daily go to and love the “illumination” - it’s not too much for me and blurs imperfections especially if I don’t want to put a lot of other makeup on like blush shimmer etc.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - soft beige shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Decided to try the matte version out to switch things up after using this for years. Nope. Love the subtle glow in this that makes it look way more natural for my skin. It’s not full coverage, but is a great base.

reviews.review_title: Want to look like a beautiful glowy goddess???
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is my summer holy grail. I absolutely adore this CC cream for summer use. It is glittery and dewy, but it makes my skin look flawless even when I do have imperfections. It hides my under-eye bags and protects me from sun even when on vacation in tropical locations. Look no further, this is the best skin product I have tried in awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's not full coverage but it's enough and can be build it'd say a good medium. Which is what I needed sits on the skin so well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great full coverage, very light, CC cream that is really a foundation.  Wouldn't recommend for young teen girls ( like my daughter) because there skin is already beautiful ;) But for us 30-40 yr. olds, phenomenal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage, love that it has SPF. Medium is pretty brown but light is too pale. Maybe I should mix them? Fairly good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just what i was looking for. Light coverage to even out my skin tone and with spf protection. Perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute FAVORITE foundation :) I have used NARS, Makeup Forever, MAC- you name it, and THIS is by far my favorite. I wore the original formula foundation and appreciated the full coverage yet didn’t look cakey. It also changed my skin over time, amazing! It worked wonders for my skin which had some acne scars. I switched to the illumination foundation once that came out and fell even more in love! It’s perfect and has a beautiful glow, but not over the top. My skin has transformed and I can honestly thank IT Cosmetics.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - taupe shade with warm undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage and shimmer. My new go-to foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! Little goes a long way. Half pump is usually enough for me because it gives a very nice coverage so don't need to build a lot of product on face. It also blends very well and smells great! Having SPF 50 is another plus (though I still wear sunscreen under it), it's a great product to refresh makeup in the middle of the day and don't need to worry about sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am an older woman with naturally dry skin and I live in an arid climate.  This CC cream goes on smoothly, doesn't make my skin flake and I love the illumination.  It isn't too much for my dry, aging skin.  It makes my skin look normal to radiant.

reviews.review_title: A good CC cream, but not full coverage foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As much as I enjoy exploring and owning most of the IT Cosmetics line...I feel their color range still gets me- since Medium is too dark (tan) on me, when they said it's their most popular- so I returned it in exchanged for the LIGHT and this one has more of a greyish/ashy undertone, but it's lighter. So I've been mixing this CC  with my favorite foundation, just to achieve a better match and undertone! I feel my color match would be the FAIR and MEDIUM mixed together. Since I have light skin, but with a yellow undertone.  Their current LIGHT is not light enough and doesn't even have the right undertone for me, their medium is way too Tan on me, and has TOO much yellow in it.   I only thing I like about this CC  is it's high SPF 50! It does goes on pretty sheer and has more of a medium coverage and a luminous finished, which I like. Since I do not have oily skin at all, so I do like this CC .   THIS IS DEFINITELY NOT FULL-COVERAGE as they claim. Perhaps their formulation has changed over the years, when it used to be full coverage? I don't know, but bring back the original formula then!
